bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性４連ダメージ
bb.name: フラッシュゲイル

dictionary.description: A pikeman from the ruined Principality of Vriksha, he eventually became one of the Six Heroes. He was a quiet, noble boy, but one day he saw the Demon Pike Drevas, lying in a storehouse on his estate. Suddenly, he informed his family he was leaving to train. His parents strongly opposed, but in the end he ran away, Drevas in hand. Rumors are that the spear spoke to him.
dictionary.fusion:
Still not enough...
I must get stronger...
dictionary.summon:
Do you like my pike?
Alright, I'll let you see it,
but just this once...

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性５連ダメージ
bb.name: フラッシュトルネード

dictionary.description: A pikeman from the ruined Principality of Vriksha, he later became one of the Six Heroes. Those who faced Lance during his training not only saw the power of Drevas, but were also in awe of his superior technique. Seeing such beautiful technique from such an inexperienced pikeman made him seem almost genius, but he hated being referred to in this way.
dictionary.evolution:
Look, Drevas.
We've become stronger.
dictionary.fusion:
I'm still inexperienced.
I must continue training.
dictionary.summon:
Genius? I hate that word.
It denies my effort.
I'll show you what I mean.

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性５連ダメージ
bb.name: ミストラルレイジ

dictionary.description: A pikeman from the ruined Principality of Vriksha, wielder of the Demon Pike, Drevas. Later, he became one of the Six Heroes. During his travels, he managed to free the sealed away World Tree Altro. Though unconfirmed, it is said that freeing Altro was his objective from the very beginning.
dictionary.evolution:
This power...
It's all thanks to you.
dictionary.fusion:
I need to reach a higher
level if we are to achieve
our goals...
dictionary.summon:
I can feel Drevas' potential
when I'm with you.
Can you feel it, too?

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: エターナルゼファー

dictionary.description: A pikeman from the ruined Principality of Vriksha, and one of the six heroes. After releasing the World Tree he wasn't seen until the battle with the gods began. His Demon Pike Drevas had awoken, and its blade now carried the strength of the World Tree. He took on the gods with his own might, refusing to align himself with any military entity.
dictionary.evolution:
You'll never forget the
power of my Sacred Pike,
Drevas!
dictionary.fusion:
It's OK, Drevas.
We'll make it in time...
dictionary.summon:
You've earned our trust.
Let us clear for you a
path forward

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: エターナルシンフォニー

dictionary.description: A pikeman from the ruined Principality of Vriksha, and one of the Six Heroes. He kept fighting for the masses with his Demon Pike Drevas. As he grew stronger and sharper, he started being consumed by Drevas. Despite there being a curse on the pike assimilates its wielder with nature, Lance didn't refrain from fighting. He seemed to be anticipating the change instead.
dictionary.evolution:
More Fusion, I see.
I've made a promise to Drevas
to become one with nature.
dictionary.fusion:
Drevas, do you feel it?
My body is gradually changing…
dictionary.summon:
Well, let's go!
Drevas and I
will show you a bright future!

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ・最大ＨＰを１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹華神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力をアップ
sbb.name: ミストラルジハード

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１２連ダメージ
bb.name: クラリオスエンヴァー

dictionary.description: As he kept fighting the gods, Lance's Demon Pike ate into his body even further. In the midst of everything, Lance unleashed his pike's ultimate power and flung it across a great distance in order to defend himself from a series of sniper attacks that had been continuously targeting him. And though this attack was successful in taking down the sniper, it consequently sped up the rate at which the Demon Pike was deteriorating his body. Moments later, a lone knight showed himself before him to deliver a message. It is said that an expression of relief came over Lance's face upon hearing the knight's words, after which he turned into a great tree whilst embracing the Demon Pike.
dictionary.evolution:
I fear nothing now.
I'll continue living beside Drevas.
I'll surpass the gods just by doing that.
dictionary.fusion:
My entire being
is turning into one with Drevas...
I can feel Drevas deep in my soul...
dictionary.summon:
When I close my eyes and listen closely
I can hear the voice of someone precious
calling me...

extra skill.desc: 「魔槍ドレヴァス」を装備時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ＆確率で被ダメージを２０％軽減
extra skill.name: 大樹への回帰

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を１００％アップ・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹融神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: 破壊の大樹

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な樹属性２１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力に応じて攻撃力を超絶アップ
ubb.name: リブル＝セブン

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性３連ダメージ
bb.name: カルネージスカイ

dictionary.description: A hunter living in the forest on the outskirts of the Principality of Vriksha. As he was locally famous as an expert bowman, many visited from afar to witness his skills. He also liked to show off, and was always happy to demonstrate his abilities. One day he was invited to the palace of the Principality. it is said this incident changed his fate.
dictionary.fusion:
Watch this!
My abilities have improved!
dictionary.summon:
Ah! A Summoner!
I'll be your friend.
I'll also lend you my bow!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの輝き

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性３連ダメージ
bb.name: スペリオルニードル

dictionary.description: A hunter living in the forest on the outskirts of the Principality of Vriksha. He was a famous archer whose fate changed when he was invited to the duke's palace, where a princess took interest in him. Lario liked the recognition, despite how poorly military life suited him. However, he proved his worth and found himself a leader among its ranks.
dictionary.evolution:
The power of my bow is known
throughout the lands.
Surely you've heard of it?
dictionary.fusion:
I will become even stronger!
So relax and leave it to me!
dictionary.summon:
You want to see my bow skill?
Alright then, ally...
I guess I can show you!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの煌めき

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: シューティングスター

dictionary.description: A former hunter, Lario was an expert archer and lead bow for the Principality of Vriksha's second princess' bodyguards. He was successful in the military and rumored to be the princess' lover, but he dreamed of returning to his carefree hunter's life. However, he never got his wish and continued to protect the princess until the time of the great collapse.
dictionary.evolution:
I promise you,
I never miss my target!
dictionary.fusion:
Alright here we go!
Aim... Steady... Release!
dictionary.summon:
My arrow never misses,
but your aim is dreadful!
It looks like you need me.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの閃光

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: スターゲイル

dictionary.description: A famous archer and leader of Vriksha's second princess' bodyguards. On the verge of collapse from the gods' oncoming attacks, Lario fled the castle, taking the princess with him. However, the gods pursued them and blocked their path. Witnessing Lario's defiant resistance and feeling that she had become a burden to him, the princess attempted to give herself up. To keep her from doing so, it is said that Lario then sprouted wings from his back and flew the two of them away to safety.
dictionary.evolution:
What is this power?
It feels somehow familiar...
I felt it when I made my promise.
dictionary.fusion:
I can still get stronger!
I can no longer stand to
see anyone suffer!
dictionary.summon:
Can you see my wings?
These wings are meant to protect,
and now they are yours!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの閃光

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１３連ダメージ
bb.name: メテオリックガスト

dictionary.description: An archer from Vriksha who fought alongside the pixy army during the great war with the gods. Though he had fallen while protecting Princess Faris, he was brought back to life by the magic of the pixies. Once awake, he saw before him a completely different side of the princess fighting hand in hand with the pixies. While smiling gently, Lario rose to fight of his own will, no longer under the command of any being. And so it is said that the pixies gifted Lario's beloved bow "Sfida" with new powers.
dictionary.evolution:
I finally understand.
I've always been free.
Yes, I'm free!
dictionary.fusion:
Haha, no need to worry.
I'm an expert archer.
We'll definitely win, you'll see.
dictionary.summon:
I will fight for you.
Because it's my wish to do so.
Just like changing was hers.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ＆ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減
leader skill.name: 闘いの魔力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性４０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ出現率をアップ
sbb.name: フェイルノート

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 噛みつきウッド

dictionary.description: An liquid type demon with leaves sprouting from its head, born from the sap of a massive tree. It is curious and always hungry. There are many tales of Mossy suddenly joining those who walk through the forest. However, it should be driven away quickly since it is always after food. The lowest ranked of the demons, it is a perfect sparring partner for new Summoners.
dictionary.fusion:
Nom! This is good, nom!
I want more, nom!
dictionary.summon:
You gonna eat that, nom?
Alright! Then I'll
join you, nom!

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性２連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 丸かじりウッド

dictionary.description: After Mossy's bottomless stomach is full, it's said to evolve into King Mossy. Due to its huge body, its appetite grows even larger. It often goes to human settlements looking for food. Adults avoid it because it's though of as a harmful beast, but it's somehow popular with children. It sneaks onto farms shaped as an overgrown bush to steal crops, causing trouble for farmers.
dictionary.evolution:
Om, nom!? Since evolving,
I've gotten even hungrier!
dictionary.fusion:
This is delicious too, nom.
It's not just volume, but quality is important too, nom.
dictionary.summon:
Nom! Can I eat delicious
foods if I go with you, nom?
Nom, a gourmet adventure!

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 樹の護り

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性６連ダメージ＆自分のＢＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 食べ尽くしウッド

dictionary.description: The mischievous Kaiser Mossy is said to have come into being after living for an eternity. It spends its time breathing life into withering plants by the sacred fruit-bearing tree it calls home. When it gets hungry though, the Kaiser Mossy is known to release a powerful blast of wind that often sends the pixies of the forest flying. Some believe the reason this creature was found in the desolate lands of Ishgria is because it had gone there in search of delicious food to eat.
dictionary.evolution:
Do I still like pranks, you ask?
I don't do such childish
things anymore, nom!
dictionary.fusion:
This isn't enough, nom.
If you don't hurry up and feed me...
I may just...! Nom!
dictionary.summon:
You're a Summoner, right? Nom.
Go out there and collect the tastiest
fruits you can find! Nom!

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を１５％アップ＆樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 樹神の天冠

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: 大地の水

dictionary.description:
A geomancer active from the ruined Vriksha Duchy. As she was from a nomadic tribe, there are few records of her youth.
A geomancer deciphers and manipulates nature. Claris was rarely in any one place for very long, but spent 10 years in Vriksha. Her purpose is unclear, but rumors are she was searching for buried treasure or that she had a lover.
dictionary.fusion:
Amazing, isn't it?
I can feel the flow of
righteous energy.
dictionary.summon:
I've been waiting for you.
I will show you the
ideal direction in which to head.

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 樹の護り

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: アルカナディア

dictionary.description: A geomancer active from the ruined Vriksha Duchy. During the war with the gods she awakened the ability to manipulate time, allowing her to become known as a time mage. There are few records of time mages, and how she acquired the power is still being researched. One theory is that chronomancy is a natural power with great desctructive force, but there is nothing to prove this theory.
dictionary.evolution:
Everyone has this ability.
My ability is just a bit stronger than most.
dictionary.fusion:
Energy flows with time.
I can feel a great energy
flowing through me.
dictionary.summon:
I've been waiting for you.
I will show you time
moving towards justice.

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 樹の護り

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: 時空の光

dictionary.description: A geomancer once active in the ruined Vriksha Duchy. Despite her gaining the impressive power of being able to manipulate time, there exists very little proof of it. Record of Claris's efforts was, however, found in the diary of a girl from a small village. It was recorded that she had wielded great magical power, like that of the gods. The young girl wrote of her in her diary, "It's like she had that power inside of her all along."
dictionary.evolution:
I evolved because
I now know what it means
to manipulate time.
dictionary.fusion:
Power is to be used when
necessary and in moderation.
You agree, don't you?
dictionary.summon:
I already knew you were
going to summon me.
I know your future, too...

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 樹の護り

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力を少しアップ
bb.name: パワースクリーム

dictionary.description: A human-like plant native to deep forests where the sun can't reach. They sleep as they grow in the earth. If pulled from the ground they will become violent and attack whoever disturbed them. They are dangerous when carelessly touched as their scream can shake a person's very soul. However, it could just be that they're just a bit crazy as they are sometimes friendly.
dictionary.fusion:
Wah!
Uhuh, uhuh!!
dictionary.summon:
Grr!
Grr!
Grr!

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力を少しアップ
bb.name: パワーインテンション

dictionary.description: A human-like plant native to deep, sunless forests. Since they perform photosynthesis like other plants, they don't harm or interact with humans unless necessary. However, when poor care is given to plants or forests, they attack with a war cry. They don't hate people, however, and have been found smiling near well-kept gardens and farms.
dictionary.evolution:
Grr!! I've had a good life,
so maybe I should stop
with the shouting.
dictionary.fusion:
I can't decide whether to be
a bonsai or a flower arrangement.
dictionary.summon:
I don't have allies.
But you may be an exception.
I'm counting on you.

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 樹の護り

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力を少しアップ
bb.name: 大地の叫び

dictionary.description: An animal-like plant that lives deep in the forest. They like humid places and will eat anything that fits in their mouth. They are feared as protectors of the forest as they live deep within and are rarely ever encountered by humans. However, as scary as they may look, out of kindness they give fruits to starving travelers. Apart from that, should anyone cause harm to the forest they release an aroma throughout the forest which changes the personality of all it's creatures and makes them attack aggressively.
dictionary.evolution:
Did I scare you, Summoner?
There's no need to get defensive,
it's just me.
dictionary.fusion:
I still hunger, Summoner.
Give me more of that.
Please, hurry.
dictionary.summon:
I am Leshy.
You're a Summoner, are you not?
I wonder if I should go with you.

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 樹の護り

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性４連ダメージ＆高確率で怪我状態にする
bb.name: 大円斬

dictionary.description: A bandit from the forested mountain bordering the ruined Vriksha Duchy. A useless man that the people of Vriksha called rude, vulgar and mean. However, his power with an axe was explosive, and they said he could level a large tree in a single swing. When he came to town the many people who admired him would bring him food stolen from the rich.
dictionary.fusion:
Oh, how nice.
Guess I can live off you
a bit longer.
dictionary.summon:
I don't fight for
anyone but myself.
Still, I'll help you.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の輝き

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性５連ダメージ＆高確率で怪我状態にする
bb.name: 戦斧大破斬

dictionary.description: A bandit boss from the forested mountain bordering the ruined Vriksha Duchy. Zaza continued his banditry, and the followers that admired him made him head bandit. He tried to decline by saying it was too much trouble, but when some of his underlings were killed by the gods, he showed a rage like never before, taking on the gods with his axe.
dictionary.evolution:
Don't bother flattering me!
I'm not doing anything that I
don't want to.
dictionary.fusion:
Ahaha!
So you need my help
after all?
dictionary.summon:
What a pain...
But I guess I'll give it a
go since you summoned me.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の煌めき

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性６連ダメージ＆高確率で怪我状態にする
bb.name: 鬼王大破月斬

dictionary.description: A bandit from the forested mountain bordering the ruined Vriksha Duchy. After his subordinates were killed by the gods, it is said he was drained of emotion and sought revenge against the gods, relentlessly chopping away at them with his axe. He was feared by not only the gods but humans as well, and his unwavering anger led him to be known as the "Wild Bandit." However, he continued slashing ahead with his axe, unaware of the title bestowed upon him.
dictionary.evolution:
Did you feel my rage?
I continue swinging my axe
so they can rest at ease.
dictionary.fusion:
Give me more power!
At this rate, I won't be able
to hold back my rage!
dictionary.summon:
Are you god or ally?
If you're going after them
then my axe may be of use!

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の煌めき

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復・全状態異常を回復
bb.name: 妖精の歌

dictionary.description: These fairies are said to live in deep forests. They have thin wings and can fit in the palm of a hand. They like humans fairly well and will show a lost human how to get out of the forest. They do things their own way, and may ask to go along with those they like. It's more of a declaration than a desire, though. They will follow even if their request is refused.
dictionary.fusion:
Is that for me?
I'm so happy, thanks!!
dictionary.summon:
I can go with you, right?
I've already decided!
I'm looking forward to it!

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復・全状態異常を回復
bb.name: 安らぎの聖歌

dictionary.description: The queen of the fairies who lives in deep forests. Although hard to believe because of her size, she is an elite master of the healing arts. Titania is able to help many get through difficult ailments, and many seek her as a source of luck. Her flaw is the laziness she's developed over years, which leads to tardiness and oversleeping.
dictionary.evolution:
I will show the
power of fairies only to you!
dictionary.fusion:
Well, well.
Looks like I'm still
improving!
dictionary.summon:
Did you wake me because
there are enemies near?
I'll take care of them!

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をアップ
leader skill.name: 慈愛の心

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復・全状態異常を回復
bb.name: 慈しみの韻律

dictionary.description: A fairy said to have existed since the beginning of the world. Believed to be the founder of the fairy grove, she has lived for such a long time that apparently even Finkell herself cannot remember who she really is. She is known best for her patience and superb generosity, which she kindly offers to gods and demons likewise. It is said that her healing magic is filled with so much warmth that even the most vile creatures show a calm and gentle side before her.
dictionary.evolution:
Huh? This warm power...
Did you awaken me?
I'll take good care of you!
dictionary.fusion:
Hey, thanks a lot!
Next time I'll heal you instead!
dictionary.summon:
Hello!
I will be your healer from now on.
Be nice to me, okay?

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 慈愛の真心

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性３連ダメージ
bb.name: アンゲストクシア

dictionary.description: A tree monster that has lived for several hundred years. Trees raised in areas where the Earth element is strong store up magic in their bodies making them Trents. They have extremely low interest in others and are hard to distinguish from regular trees, but Trents are always moving and say that trees that don't move are just trees. It's fairly easy to find one.
dictionary.fusion:
I'm gonna moss you up!
Here I go!!
dictionary.summon:
You are the first
Summoner I've met.
I guess I'll help you out.

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性５連ダメージ
bb.name: グランドストーム

dictionary.description: A tree monster that's over 1000 years old. Trents evolves into an Ents after bathing in magic for many centuries. They are completely self-centered and wouldn't care even if their forest was burned down and all their kind was wiped out. All it wishes to do is get bigger. It will attack of anyone who tries to get in its way.
dictionary.evolution:
I should probably be
a bit more serious now that
I've evolved...
dictionary.fusion:
Hehe, not even this will
keep me with the likes of you...
dictionary.summon:
I am an ancient Ent.
I'm reluctant to, but
I'll follow you...

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、カルマ出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 魂の輝き

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性７連ダメージ
bb.name: エーテルサーヴァント

dictionary.description: A tree monster that's over 1000 years old. It's said that a Xipe Totec is the evolved form of an Ent that, longing for so long to become stronger, sprouted a Dryad-like decoy from its trunk in hopes of using it to get more nourishment. They're greatly feared by humans whom it would lure in with its decoy and devour them when they got close, and since it's now known that this helps the tree renew itself it is sometimes also referred to as the "Tree of Rebirth."
dictionary.evolution:
Still not enough.
More, I need more!
dictionary.fusion:
I accept this power from you.
I will make good use of it.
dictionary.summon:
Get over here...
Hmph, what kind of
Summoner are you?

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、カルマ出現率をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 魂の煌めき

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、防御力・回復力を少しアップ
bb.name: マナライトサークル

dictionary.description: A powerful spirit that lives in deep forests. Dryads live in large, ancient trees and are extremely timid. They dislike combat and excel at support magic. Sometimes, as a prank, they enslave people with magic and bend them to their will. For ages, youths who disappeared in the forest have been said to have become the slaves of Dryads.
dictionary.fusion:
Hehe...
Is that all you
have to say?
dictionary.summon:
Are you the one who's lost,
or perhaps is it me!?
You're staying until you answer.

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 樹の護り

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、防御力・回復力を少しアップ
bb.name: エレメンタルウォール

dictionary.description: A powerful elf that lives in the deep forest. Known as the forest's guardian, it doesn't age and has beautiful looks and a nearly eternal lifespan. It dislikes fighting and its immensely powerful magic is usually used for defense rather than offense. Although very conservative, a curious one may leave the forest with a human it is interested in.
dictionary.evolution:
I'm glad I came with you.
Please let me continue on
with you.
dictionary.fusion:
I will use my power for
you and the forest.
dictionary.summon:
You're quite the genius.
I'm gushing with interest in you.
Please let me be your companion.

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 樹の護り

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、防御力・回復力をアップ
bb.name: グランドウォール

dictionary.description: Having lived for an eternity, a High Elf then sublimates her affectionate nature and evolves into a protector of all the forest's creatures. Lemenara had also protected them during the great war with the gods, but the forest was eventually burned down by their army. Seeing the forest burn, the soft smile disappeared from her face, and she then ferociously sought revenge against the gods. In the battle that ensued, the white wreath upon her head was stained red with the blood of the gods.
dictionary.evolution:
Is my sorrow getting
through to you?
Do you feel my angst?
dictionary.fusion:
Let's try and feel the
emotions of the planet.
Only then can we advance.
dictionary.summon:
To be one with nature
is my one and only hope.
I entrust this hope to you.

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 樹の結界

bb.desc: 味方全体の全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、防御力・回復力をかなりアップ
bb.name: イージスウォール

dictionary.description: Lemenara's new form after evolving in order to fight against the gods. Said to love all creatures who care for and respect the land, she hates those who mean to hurt and destroy it. Thus, she refuses to forgive the gods who seek to destroy these humans meant to love the nature that surrounds them. However, this doesn't mean that she favors the human race over any other. Where she to find a human who disrespected the land, she would strike him or her with as much fury as that of the gods themselves.
dictionary.evolution:
Look forward, child of the land.
Whatever grief comes your way,
I shall help you through it.
dictionary.fusion:
If you spread seeds on this earth,
the land will help them grow.
I promise you a great harvest.
dictionary.summon:
I am the will of the earth.
This land shall never give up
on all of its children.

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減＆被ダメージ時、確率でＢＢゲージを増加・確率でＨＰを回復
leader skill.name: 樹創神の結界

sbb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
sbb.name: フォースマテリアル

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性６連ダメージ＆自分のＨＣ出現率を超絶アップ
bb.name: わたし、戦います！

dictionary.description: A princess from the ruined Vriksha Duchy. Because of her status she was raised with great care by an overprotective bodyguard. This made her yearn for freedom and dream of adventure. Those around her mocked her dream, but she was serious. She secretly practiced the sword, and was soon able to surpass other swordsmen. However, she was still shy around men.
dictionary.fusion:
I'm happy getting stronger...
Do you think that's strange for
a princess?
dictionary.summon:
Umm...
Please take me with you...
I promise to do my part.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 猛者の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性８連ダメージ＆自分のＨＣ出現率を超絶アップ
bb.name: 私の剣で皆を守ります！

dictionary.description: A princess of the ruined Vriksha Duchy, and one of the country's most prominent swordswomen. She took to the battlefield when the gods invaded her country. With the Earth Sword Vriklius in hand she engaged in battle. However, due to her inexperience, she became isolated on the battlefield. Many sacrificed themsevles to save her, but their efforts came to a tragic end.
dictionary.evolution:
I've changed, but I musn't
be overconfident!
Was that too forward?
dictionary.fusion:
I need to get stronger...
I can't afford to repeat
the same mistake...
dictionary.summon:
Sir Summoner...
Please let me go with you...
I will do all I can...

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 王者の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性１０連ダメージ＆自分のＨＣ出現率を超絶アップ
bb.name: 私に任せてください！

dictionary.description: A princess from the ruined Vriksha Duchy, she was also a prominent warrior in her home country. Through her actions there was a moment of peace, but soon the duchy began to collapse under the enemy's overwhelming force. Then, just as she was about to sacrifice herself for her people, a miracle happened. An entity entered her body, granting her even more strength than before. However, what the people didn't know was that she exchanged her life for this power.
dictionary.evolution:
This form...
It seems I have evolved.
Could this be a mistake?
dictionary.fusion:
I must get stronger...
Even if it means my body is
destroyed in the process...
dictionary.summon:
Summoner, I would like...
No, never mind...
Alright, let's be on our way!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性１８連ダメージ＆自分のＨＣ出現率を超絶アップ
bb.name: この剣にすべてを！

dictionary.description: A princess from the ruined Vriksha Duchy who exchanged her life to gain power. The Vriksha Duchy managed to hold on thanks to a few local victories, but the condition of the war only got worse. With her lifespan growing shorter as she used her powers, conversely she became even stronger than before. Once the vassals of her family realized what she had sacrificed for the people, Lidith shook her head with a smile, and continued fighting to help citizens evacuate. Watching such selflessness in action, many of her vassals decided to fight alongside her until the bitter end.
dictionary.evolution:
Summoner, command me!
Order me to fight!
I'll press forward if you say so!
dictionary.fusion:
It's so warm...
I feel like it's being healed...
My once broken soul.
dictionary.summon:
Maybe I was ungrateful...
But that was the only way
in which I could save everyone...

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ＆雷属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 雷神の威光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性２２連ダメージ＆自分のＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ＆味方全体に３ターン、全状態異常を無効
sbb.name: ホーリークラウン

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復・全状態異常を回復
bb.name: ルーセントパージ

dictionary.description: A giant tree with a willof its own and the ability to move. It can also speak, but since it gets its nutrition from photosynthesis, it's still biologically classified as a plant. Alneu's fruit contains a stimulant that can heal fatigue, and it often gives it to humans it likes. Contrary to its large size it likes small and cute things, especially human children.
dictionary.fusion:
If I were to use human words,
I guess I'd say that felt good.
dictionary.summon:
Why do you seek me, little one?
I will make sure your wish
comes true.

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をアップ
leader skill.name: 慈愛の心

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復・全状態異常を回復
bb.name: べネボランスパージ

dictionary.description: When Great Tree Alneu has lived for more than 10,000 years, it transforms into theg World Tree, Altro. Basically immortal, Altro, who has been around since the beginning of time, is also know as the world's eldest being. Some search for Altro looking to solve the world'd most difficult problems, but since it lives deep inside a secluded area, most get discouraged from looking for it.
dictionary.evolution:
All the world ever was or
ever will be is where my
power comes from.
dictionary.fusion:
My roots are soaked
in delicious nutrients.
I should bear good fruit...
dictionary.summon:
Justice for all creation.
If you are virtuous, little one,
I shall be your shield.

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をアップ
leader skill.name: 慈愛の心

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復
bb.name: ゴッドパージ

dictionary.description: Eltri is said to be the ancestor of all the trees in Grand Gaia. Immense and able to float in the air, it's so impressive that some people mistake it for a floating island. If it floats in the same place for many years, sometimes a forest will suddenly appear nearby, even in wastelands. It is worshipped as the God Tree as it has the ability to sprout life all around it.
dictionary.evolution: Even if each individual is small, the accumulation of their power is great.
dictionary.fusion:
The power within me will
circle the world and return to
you again.
dictionary.summon:
I have shone light on the paths the world and yourself travel.
Now I will follow you.

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 慈愛の真心

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復
bb.name: スペクトルパージ

dictionary.description: The father of all trees, Eltri, after acquiring the knowledge of countless years came to hold a multitude of personalities. It's thought he separated his personalities so that he could debate between them, increasing the precision of his thinking. There is an unconfirmed theory that states that his multiple personalities reside within his fort-like exterior. It appears that the faces that can be seen on him now represent his main personalities, with all important conversations going through them.
dictionary.evolution:
A world isolated by the gods.
Would you like to see into it?
If so, let us show you the way.
dictionary.fusion:
Our power comes not from
fighting but from knowledge.
What drives you to find power?
dictionary.summon:
We confirm your strong spirit.
We will help pursue your hopes.
Let us seek truth for the future.

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ獲得時の回復量を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 慈愛の誠心

30115.name: 大界創樹アルトリオン

sbb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
sbb.name: コスモラディウス

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
bb.name: アウレアパージ

dictionary.description: Legend tells of a secret dimension found in Grand Gaia. However, instead of being just a separate layer, this dimension holds an entire world within itself. Though it may sound like an impossibility, there remains one literary work which mentions said dimension. And according to it, there was once a tree-like being which borrowed humanity's power to grow stronger in order to return to its own world, completely unaware to the fact that it was already there.
dictionary.evolution:
I came into being before
I ever willed it. Why do you
hold on to my existence?
dictionary.fusion:
Every time I grow, something
awakens within me... Before long,
I shall become one with the world.
dictionary.summon:
What is a world? There is no point
to that question, for worlds will
keep multiplying regardless.

extra skill.desc: 弱点属性ダメージを無効＆低確率で被ダメージを超絶軽減
extra skill.name: 存在する世界

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ獲得時の回復量を大幅にアップ＆クリティカル・弱点属性ダメージを無効
leader skill.name: 神樹の命層

30116.name: 神創樹ヴェルトリオン

sbb.desc: 味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加＆味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をかなりアップ
sbb.name: コスモヴォーリション

ubb.desc: 味方全体の全状態異常を回復・確率で一度だけ戦闘不能を耐える効果を付与＆３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを全回復
ubb.name: 創天命浄

bb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に樹属性１０連ダメージ
bb.name: ゼフォニックブレット

dictionary.description: A gatling gunner who forages in the Vriksha Duchy. He lost his memory and was known as a visitor from another world with an unknown origin. His gatling gun could take down heavily armored regiments, but as Vriksha was unable to make ammunition, he would only be used in the most important battles. Dissatisfied with this, it is said he spent his days researching.
dictionary.fusion:
Bang, bang!
Don't worry, I'm just
test firing!
dictionary.summon:
This is Grand Gaia?
I was summoned here again?
It doesn't matter, I'll help.

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹神の力

bb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に樹属性１５連ダメージ
bb.name: ジェノサイドグリッツ

dictionary.description: A gatling gunner who forages in the Vriksha Duchy. Douglas was said to be a visitor from another world, and since his gun was nonexistent in Grand Gaia he faced difficulties procuring ammuniction. However, he succeeded in making a mechanism that used magic for ammunition. The gun would then unleash a fury of bullets as long as the user's magic held up.
dictionary.evolution:
The unity of gun and magic.
Now I must aim for my place
in history!
dictionary.fusion:
My power is growing,
along with that of
my Gatling gun!
dictionary.summon:
Will you supply me with ammo?
If so, with the power of my
gatling gun I'll help you!

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹創神の力

bb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に樹属性２０連ダメージ
bb.name: シャイニングゾーク

dictionary.description: A gatling gunner who forages in the Vriksha Duchy.  He is said to be from another world. He took on the gods with his gatling gun, restlessly training his magic to increase the power of each shot. He followed no strategy, never fearing battle. He faced tens of thousands alone, drawing on his last bit of energy only after defeating the enemy general.
dictionary.evolution:
Can you hear me!?
This beastly machine took
on the gods themselves!
dictionary.fusion:
No one faces up to my
gatling gun and survives!
dictionary.summon:
Why's my gun so happy?
Maybe because you called on me?
Either way, I've got your back!

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹創神の力

bb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に強力な樹属性２２連ダメージ
bb.name: デスヴォートブリンガー

dictionary.description: A magical machine gunner who forages in the Vriksha Duchy. Historical texts tell of how he challenged tens of thousands of gods on his own before suffering a fatal wound. However, there is a handful of documents chronicling his actions afterwards. It seems he had disappeared into a gate to the otherworld just before dying. As the war and mankind itself drew to an end, Douglas and his immensely powerful magic gattling gun once again stood in defience before the army of gods.
dictionary.evolution:
The battlefield calls me.
That's why I've returned.
There's no other reason.
dictionary.fusion:
Surely you understand?
The value of what I wanted
and of what I received...
dictionary.summon:
So you called me here?
Then let's go!
We've no time to chat!

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 樹巧神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性３０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをアップ
sbb.name: スパークカノン

dictionary.description: A small nymph thought to be born from earth, one of the six elements made by the gods. It likes interacting with humans, and will immediately follow any traveler it sees. While that's not a serious problem, people perceive it as annoying since it relentlessly asks questions when ignored. Despite that, many Summoners search it out as it can grant special powers.
dictionary.summon:
I am an Earth Nymph!
You seem interesting...
That's it! I'm going with you!

dictionary.description: A spirit that rules earth, one of the six elements created by the gods. Leaves that grow on its head and tail can allegedly heal injured plants. It is like a more annoying Earth Nymph. It likes humans, especially when they are annoyed. Summoners look for it believing that it can awaken hidden abilities in others.
dictionary.summon:
I found a Summoner!
Let me be your friend!
I'm going with you either way!

dictionary.description: Worshipers of earth gave this miraculous stone idol life through prayer. It's known to exist in the ruins discovered in Grand Gaia's jungle. The Summoner who discovered it was attacked and returned to Elgaia nearly dead. Many Summoners later entered the jungle to find the Idol, believing the legend that its power will awaken a mysterious inherent power.
dictionary.summon:
I am a Forest Idol.
It seems you know my purpose.
I will travel with you.

dictionary.description: Created by the gods, this totem embodies earth's power. If World Tree Altro and God Tree Eltri are deified trees, then the Earth Totem is the divine messenger that brought them to life. Wherever it appears, even a bustling city will be instantly become an overgrown forest. Legend has is that those who the great gods deem worthy can gain their power.
dictionary.summon:
I am an Earth Totem.
You would be wise to use my
godly power responsibly.

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性３連ダメージ＆高確率で怪我・弱体状態にする
bb.name: ティエラナックル

dictionary.description: A boxer who studied martial arts at the Toltya Dojo in Sama. As a baby, the head of Toltya Dojo discovered her abandoned in front of his school’s gate. Trained in the art of fighting from an early age, the power she unleashed from her fists possessed a potency that belied her cute appearance. On her 16th birthday, the head of the school handed her a letter that claimed to be from her parents. Eager to follow up on this new lead, she set out for the Principality of Vriksha.
dictionary.fusion:
Whoa!
Is this fusion stuff amazing or what?!
I can feel the strength coursing through me!
dictionary.summon:
You must be pretty handy if you’re able to summon me!
Hm? Whaddya mean “am I a girl”?
Of course I am, you dodo!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 猛者の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性４連ダメージ＆高確率で怪我・弱体状態にする
bb.name: アダマントクラック

dictionary.description: A boxer who studied martial arts at the Toltya Dojo in Sama. Surrounded from childhood by burly men locked in the pursuit of strength, Nemia was sensitive about the manly mannerisms she had picked up. Upon reaching Vriksha to find her true parents, she was dismayed to find herself the butt of many a cruel joke about her rough and ready manner. She soon turned her tormentors’ jibes into howls of pain, however, and made quite the name for herself wherever she went.
dictionary.evolution:
Nice!
That’s this training level finished.
Okay, it’s time to take things a notch higher!
dictionary.fusion:
Yes, YES!!
Soon I’ll be the strongest person alive!
dictionary.summon:
Have no fear––I’m here to help!
Hm? You thought I was a boy?
I DARE you to say that again!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 猛者の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性５連ダメージ＆高確率で怪我・弱体状態にする
bb.name: グランドカイザー

dictionary.description: A boxer who studied martial arts at the Toltya Dojo in Sama. After arriving in Vriksha to look for her real parents, word of Nemia’s strength soon spread, prompting many plucky individuals to challenge her to duels. While dispatching her would-be challengers one after the other, she finally perfected a secret technique her foster father had taught her in her youth. Legend has it that whatever her fist came into contact with shattered into a thousand pieces.
dictionary.evolution:
Yes! Thanks to you,
I feel like I’ve finally achieved
true strength...
dictionary.fusion:
Tee hee...
With your fusion skills and my natural
talent, there’s nothing we can’t do!
dictionary.summon:
Prepare to be dazzled.
It’s time you witnessed the secret
techniques of Tolteia Dojo!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 王者の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性６連ダメージ＆高確率で怪我・弱体状態にする
bb.name: アティラシェイク

dictionary.description: A boxer who studied martial arts at the Toltya Dojo. She entered tournament after tournament looking for her parents, but after so many victories she became somewhat prideful. In addition to the invasion of the gods, she soon saw herself in a crisis. She was then saved by the boy who was once her pupil. Though she now continued her training out of the shame in how prideful she had become, it has also been said that she was strict on herself in part because she'd come to see her former pupil as a grown man.
dictionary.evolution:
I'm stronger, don't you think?
But I'm still looking forward.
I can't lose another fight!
dictionary.fusion:
Alright, let's go!
I'll smash everything with
my god-like fists!
dictionary.summon:
I'm so happy to have
this chance to grow.
What are you looking at?

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性１４連ダメージ＆高確率で怪我・弱体状態にする
bb.name: エンプレスゲイザー

dictionary.description: A boxer who studied martial arts at the Toltya Dojo. After a short, yet emotional reunion with her parents, Nemia set out to the battlefield in order to the repel the incoming grand-scale attacks by the God Army. Prepared to lay her life on the line, she tried to buy enough time for her people to escape, but Zeln suddenly appeared to save her from impending death. Seeing him in a totally different light than before, Nemia's emotions stirred and something changed within her heart. This emotional growth is what allowed Nemia to evolve into a new form.
dictionary.evolution:
I think I finally understand who I
really am. It's a bit embarrassing,
but it feels good!
dictionary.fusion:
It's like I've gained more power
than ever before!
What a strange feeling.
dictionary.summon:
People can grow.
He showed me that,
so now I can move forward too.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を３０％アップ＆ターン毎にＨＰを少し回復
leader skill.name: 闘神の天啓

sbb.desc: 敵単体に強力な樹属性１８連ダメージ＆自分のＢＢゲージを満タンにする
sbb.name: 天拳『無神剛覇』

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性６連ダメージ＆確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: ミラージュニードル

dictionary.description: A young boy who was raised by Titania as a pixy. Abandoned in a faeries’ grove as a baby, he grew up thinking he was a pixy until the day he realized he looked different than everyone else. Shocked to discover the truth about his childhood, he embarked on a journey to find other humans as a means of coming to terms with his new identity. While on his travels, he heard about the gods’ plan to destroy the world.
dictionary.fusion:
I haven’t felt this way in some time.
I feel... strong again, somehow.
dictionary.summon:
You’re a human Summoner?
What would you say to helping
me protect the pixies?

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 猛者の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性７連ダメージ＆確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: ミリオンスラスト

dictionary.description: A young boy who was raised by Titania as a pixy. Upon reaching the village he believed his real parents to be in, Leore was ambushed by a regiment of gods. He quickly disposed of them, and immediately returned to the faeries’ grove, where he implored Titania to ready an army. After Leore had told her about the gods’ plan for world domination, Titania ordered him to rule over the pixy army.
dictionary.evolution:
It is a ruler’s solemn duty to protect
and lead those weaker than him.
I shall refuse no one my assistance.
dictionary.fusion:
Just as the Queen charged me
with the pixies’ fate, so you too
bestow upon me this great power.
dictionary.summon:
I was born a human, but raised a pix.
Winning this battle is the least
I could do for them.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 王者の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１０連ダメージ＆確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: ラスタグラデーション

dictionary.description: A young boy who was raised by Titania as a pixy. Under Leore’s command, the once weak pixy army formed an alliance with human forces, and quickly became a force to be reckoned with. Leore’s rousing rhetoric about the shared plight of pixies and humans raised his forces’ spirits, and the sight of his dashing figure swinging his sword on the battlefield is said to have inspired both armies to feats of greatness.
dictionary.evolution:
I pledge to you the goodwill of
the pixy race and every living
thing in the forest.
dictionary.fusion:
Retreat is not an option.
Forward is the only way!
Fear not, I am by your side.
dictionary.summon:
I am both human and pixy.
I was put on this planet to unite
our two tribes.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１２連ダメージ＆確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: ノービリスサンシオン

dictionary.description: A human boy who was raised by Titania as a pixy. He was seen as a threat thanks to his ability to bring pixy and human forces together, and a plot was formed for his assassination. However, thanks to Titania's intervention this attempt never came to fruition, though in return she lost her life. Immediately after, Leore exploded wih rage, angrily swinging his sword until all the flowers floating around him were soaked red with blood.
dictionary.evolution:
There are some who will
never receive my mercy!
I'll chop them all up!
dictionary.fusion:
Life is more fleeting than
a flower in the wind.
Still, it is important to fight!
dictionary.summon:
I can't forgive a world in
which the good are trampled.
That is why I fight!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力・防御力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 統神の波動

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１４連ダメージ＆確率で弱体状態にする＆味方全体のＨＰを大回復
sbb.name: ローズテンラム

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性４連ダメージ＆高確率で毒・病気状態にする
bb.name: グランドバッシュ

dictionary.description: One of the four legendary warriors who fought to save the Kingdom of Palmyna. Clad from head to toe in armor which concealed her true identity, legend has it that this knight was actually the Princess of Palmyna in disguise. After hearing about the gods’ plans to lay waste to Palmyna, Edea clad herself in the legendary Emerald Armor of Lafdranya, and set out on a mission to save her homeland.
dictionary.fusion:
W-Wow! I can feel the power
surging through me!
Hey, don’t peek inside my armor!
dictionary.summon:
Will you join me and fight
against the gods?
In that case, raise your sword!

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹神の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性６連ダメージ＆高確率で毒・病気状態にする
bb.name: アストロンバッシュ

dictionary.description: One of the four legendary warriors who fought to save the Kingdom of Palmyna, and commonly thought to have been Palmyna’s princess in disguise. The bond she shared with her comrades in arms awakened the true potential within her. Her legendary emerald armor was actually a broadsword which turned into full body armor with a magical incantation. It is said to have drawn its powers from the earth.
dictionary.evolution:
I’m feeling great!
I really lucked out getting to be
your companion, huh?
dictionary.fusion:
The land’s power is flowing into me.
H-Hey, cut it out!
You know I don’t like showing my face!
dictionary.summon:
Onwards to our destiny!
There is no turning back.
May you cleave a path to greatness!

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹創神の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性８連ダメージ＆高確率で毒・病気状態にする
bb.name: グランドクロス

dictionary.description: One of the four legendary warriors who fought to save the Kingdom of Palmyna, and commonly thought to have been Palmyna’s princess in disguise. In the final showdown to stop the gods’ assault on her homeland, Edea risked her life to protect her comrades. Legend tells of how when they saw her gravely wounded body, her fellow warriors unleashed an attack of such ferocity that it altered the world’s very axis. Whether the legend is true or not has yet to be verified.
dictionary.evolution:
What a powerful feeling!
The Emerald Armor of Lafdranya
looks happy to be back, too!
dictionary.fusion:
O, Land of Palmyna.
Please, bestow upon me your power...
The power to save the world...
dictionary.summon:
So, we finally meet!
I have been waiting for this day
for a long time.

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹創神の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性１１連ダメージ＆高確率で毒・病気状態にする
bb.name: グランドゲール

dictionary.description: One of the four legendary warriors who fought to save the Kingdom of Palmyna. She felt her life coming to an end during her battle with Cardes, commander of the gods. However, she never regretted what she did to protect her beloved comrades. With the last of her life force she unlocked the hidden power in her sparkling armor Lafdranya, saving her comrades from the dire crisis they faced. She then fell into a deep sleep. Her armor held her tight as she slept, as if it had a will of its own.
dictionary.evolution:
I will never regret my actions.
Even if I find myself without aid,
I choose to walk my own path.
dictionary.fusion:
I can feel power flowing.
But is this my own power?
I just can't tell...
dictionary.summon:
How do I appear to you?
I no longer feel like myself.
Do you still need my help?

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ・防御力・回復力を１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹鎧神の力

sbb.desc: 敵単体に強力な樹属性１２連ダメージ＆高確率で毒・病気状態にする＆味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを軽減
sbb.name: アルマパグローム

bb.desc: 敵単体に強力な樹属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で毒・怪我・弱体・病気を発生する効果を付与＆１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: グランドウィーヴ

dictionary.description: One of the four legendary warriors who fought to save the Kingdom of Palmyna. Managing to seal Cardes in the underworld, Edea fell into a deep slumber while still clad in her sparkling armor, Lafdranya. However, after hearing her comrades call her name, Edea woke once again, weakening the seal on Cardes in the process. Having decided anew to defeat the Fallen God alongside her dear friends, Edea's Lafdranya transformed itself into a great sword in order to help its owner's will become a reality.
dictionary.evolution:
You can't build a future by just
being defensive! I chose to fight
to live alongside my friends!
dictionary.fusion:
I shall accept it all.
After all, the reason I am here
is because I wished it so.
dictionary.summon:
Lafdranya used all of its power
to help me... I will never forget
such a noble sacrifice...

extra skill.desc: 「緑輝剣鎧ラフドラニア」を装備時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ＆ＢＢ及びＳＢＢに「味方全体の全状態異常を回復」を追加
extra skill.name: 鎧の意志

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を１００％アップ・防御力を３０％アップ＆クリティカルを無効
leader skill.name: 樹鎧麗神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で毒・怪我・弱体・病気を発生する効果を付与＆１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
sbb.name: ラストパグローム

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な樹属性２１連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、確率で攻撃力を１ターン超絶低下する効果を付与＆１ターン、被ダメージを１/４に軽減
ubb.name: アタラクシア

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性３連ダメージ＆高確率で麻痺状態にする
bb.name: クラックアックス

dictionary.description: A member of an elven race which bears the power of the earth. It's strong despite its size, and a single swing of its axe is powerful enough to cause great damage to even heavily armored monsters. It's also skillful for how it appears, making its own axe, headpiece, shield, and armor by hand. Being able to make one's own equipment is seen as a Dwarf's rite of passage, and one isn't able to even step foot onto the battlefield until they're able to do so.
dictionary.fusion:
Make me stronger!
I can get much stronger!
This isn't all I have!
dictionary.summon:
Look! I've been summoned!
Well then, Summoner!
How shall I assist you?

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性５連ダメージ＆高確率で麻痺状態にする
bb.name: バインドホーク

dictionary.description: A member of an elven race which bears the power of the earth. Powerful enough to be known as a "Prince" by others, this individual fights wielding a halberd larger than its own body. Even more skillful than other Dwarves, equipment and accessories made by a Dwarf Prince are often traded as high value items. However, they don't really care about price, instead concentrating on making sure the person they sell to is worthy of owning what they've made.
dictionary.evolution:
Oh, how the power flows...
Surely now I can swing an
even larger axe!
dictionary.fusion:
I'm bursting with power!
Not even the young'uns can
beat me like this!
dictionary.summon:
I think you'd look good in
what I've made here, boss.
Alright! Let's fight together!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ゼル出現率をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 富の輝き

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力を少しアップ
bb.name: バトルボイス

dictionary.description: A wandering poet who travelled all around the La Veda Republic. He once made a living as a singer at a town bar, and for a time became very popular among the people. One thoery as to how he became so popular is that one day, while walking through the woods, he saved a fairy from being attacked who then gave him a secret potion of song in return. This is considered a credible explanation due to the magical charm his songs seemed to possess.
dictionary.fusion:
I can feel power boiling
out from inside my body.
Mind if I convey this in a song?
dictionary.summon:
Do you wish to hear me sing?
Understand. I will sing for you.

leader skill.desc: 男性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 勇猛なる力

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力を少しアップ
bb.name: 闘神のレクイエム

dictionary.description: A wandering bard who travelled all around the La Veda Republic. His songs held power to charm not only humans but monsters as well. Entrapping many with his beautiful voice, a young lady from an aristocratic family confined him to a tower prison where he was forced to sing only for himself. It's said that he was secretly released by a guard who was moved by his songs, then saved by some fairies from the forest.
dictionary.evolution:
To you, who understand me.
I would like to sing for you a
song of heroes.
dictionary.fusion:
The power of a heroes spirit.
Continuing even after death,
that is the hymn of life.
dictionary.summon:
I've come with song.
If possible, I'd like to assure
where you go, music follows.

leader skill.desc: 男性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 勇猛なる力

dictionary.description: A curious creature that lives in a pot which is said to hold a power capable of dramatically changing the properties of earth. It's said that Earth Pots were used as cooking pots by chefs in the past, the trauma of which has left them fearful of coming in contact with fire. The lack of interest they have in how highly they're sought after by Summoners nowadays have left modern chefs wondering exactly how badly they were treated by chefs before.
dictionary.summon:
Wait! WAIT!
Keep that fire away from me!
I don't wanna get burned!

dictionary.description: This subspecies of Metal Ghost is said to have changed after having amassed extensive records on the element of earth. Of all the talkative members of the metal record species, this one in particular is known for its reticence. This perplexes many who come across them, however it is also said that they stare at whomever they come across with grave discontent. No one has ever been able to ascertain exactly what they're thinking.

This subspecies of Metal King is said to hold within its large body a huge collection of information on the element of earth. Though members of the metal record species mostly go uninfluenced by the knowledge they hold, there is a theory that states that Earth Kings may be comparing themselves against the knowledge they hold inside them which causes them to speak unkindly. Though they express joy when complimented, they're quick to return by saying, "You're still going to fuse me, right?"
dictionary.evolution:
What are you plans with me?
Oh, now I see!
This way is more effective...
dictionary.summon:
I'm not as strong, you know?
Oh, that's right!
All you need me for is fusion...

dictionary.description: This subspecies of Metal God is said to hold within its massive body an enormous collection of information on the known world. Though similar to the World Tree it has stored the knowledge of the forest and the trees, it doesn't give off the same air of dignity that the World Tree does. However, compared to other Metal Gods it has a beautiful voice by which it fascinates Summoners with its profound words. There are some who say they even hold memories of songs sung long ago...
dictionary.summon:
Which do you want,
to hear me sing,
or to use me in fusion?

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性４連ダメージ
bb.name: スター・ツインズ

dictionary.description: The twin princesses Il and Mina, daughters of the last emperor of the Amdahl Empire. The god-given genius of the energetic swordsman, Il, and the soft-spoken magician, Mina, was known throughout the empire by the time they were 10. However, tragedy struck on their 12th birthday when Amdahl was attacked suddenly by the former friendly neighboring nation of Palmyna. The twin princesses escaped Amdahl as the castle fell to the sudden attack.
dictionary.fusion:
Can you feel it, Mina?
Yes I can, Il.
We're growing up...
dictionary.summon:
We'll always be together.
It doesn't matter what happens.
We'll help if we can both come.

leader skill.desc: 全ての状態異常にかかりにくくなる
leader skill.name: 清緑の風

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: ツインズ・ラジェーション

dictionary.description: The twin princesses Il and Mina, daughters of the last emperor of the Amdahl Empire. The skilled swordsman, Il, and the talented magician, Mina, full of resentment toward Palmyna which had destroyed their home nation, hid themselves away as they honed their skills. Often the targets of assassins, it is said they would draw their would-be attackers into the woods where they would then finish them off. They lived to cause trouble for the opposing army from which they fled when they were younger.
dictionary.evolution:
We can become stronger
because we have each other.
Did you know that, Summoner?
dictionary.fusion:
Aren't you scared, Mina?
No, I'm fine, Il...
As long as we're together...
dictionary.summon:
Is it strange we fight together?
Either way, we're sure we
can be of use to you.

leader skill.desc: 全ての状態異常にかなりかかりにくくなる
leader skill.name: 青浄の光風

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: サザンクロス

dictionary.description: The twin princesses Il and Mina, daughters of the last emperor of the Amdahl Empire. When the gods attacked Palmyna, the two of them planned to take advantage of the confusion to take back Amdahl. However, the casualties were far greater than they could've imagined, so they instead turned their efforts toward the gods. It's been told that, seeing how much the twins had grown as they took a defensive stance before them, the former citizens of Amdahl cried out in joy.
dictionary.evolution:
We got stronger together.
We're so happy for that.
Thank you, Summoner!
dictionary.fusion:
My heart's racing, Mina...
I know, Il.
We're getting stronger!
dictionary.summon:
Let us show you what
we can do as a pair!
Let's fight together!

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効
leader skill.name: 蒼穹の神風

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１０連ダメージ
bb.name: ノーザンクロス

dictionary.description: The twin princesses Il and Mina from the Amdahl Empire which was destroyed by Palmyna. The two of them led the people of their ruined country, avoiding being pursued by the gods as they tried to escape. Then, just as their long journey was about over, they requested a meeting with their arch-enemy, the king of Palmyna. They suggested that the two sides throw away their ill will and fight together against the gods. It's said that the bravery shown by the two young warriors from Amdahl gave courage to not only their own people, but to the people of Palmyna as well.
dictionary.evolution:
Summoner!
Hatred and angst produce nothing!
Turn those feelings into strength!
dictionary.fusion:
Il's power is great.
Hehe, Mina's isn't bad either!
We can grow even stronger!
dictionary.summon:
We're amazing together!
And with you, Summoner, we
can do even more!

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効＆全てのユニットの防御力・回復力を１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 永遠の神護

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰをかなり回復
sbb.name: 天地創造

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性５連ダメージ＆確率で麻痺状態にする
bb.name: ルーンインパクト

dictionary.description: An elf knight who served as a bodyguard for the duke of the Principality of Vriksha. Though his hometown is the fairies' grove, he served as a knight for the principality in order to repay a favor he received from the late duke. Although in reality he wasn't very fond of humans, he was never ungrateful and kept faithful to his vows. Gifted with incredible speed, the way he handles his lance makes it seem like it has multiple spearheads, confusing his enemies with his elaborate movements. Thus, he was feared as the "Phantom," a nickname given to him by those who had faced his speed on the battlefield.
dictionary.fusion:
Humans are generally greedy.
Not only that, but they use their greed to gain more power.
dictionary.summon:
Summoner...
If I have to serve humans again, there must be a pretty good reason.

leader skill.desc: 敵撃破時、確率でＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 力奪の重命

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性７連ダメージ＆確率で麻痺状態にする
bb.name: ルーンエフェクト

dictionary.description: An elf knight who served as a bodyguard for the duke of the Principality of Vriksha. When the great war against the gods started, Ristrall remained in the dukedom in order to fight for the humans, according to the orders he had received from the elf princess Lemenara. Although at first he disliked humans, it is said that by this time his prejudice had waned. Ristrall, who as a knight elf fought in the name of humans, became the symbol of loyalty towards the family alongside Leore, who although human himself, had managed to become the Pixy Lord.
dictionary.evolution:
After placing so much trust in me,
as a knight I am bound by oath to return the favor.
dictionary.fusion:
Humans think of so many different things.
To think that they gave birth to desire and wisdom.
dictionary.summon:
So you acknowledge my place in the battlefield.
Hmph, good. It's not like I dislike fighting anyway.

leader skill.desc: 敵撃破時、確率でＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 力奪の厳命

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: グランドザッパー

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Lugina, a Summoner belonging to the Akras Summoners' Hall. The real Lugina is leader of the 23rd Demon Slayers Division "Sky Guardians." Full of unwavering pride in himself, many regarded his rivalry with the very popular Karl as odd. Though his strength as a Summoner is impressive thanks to his well calculated actions, his conduct and way of speaking often get him into trouble.
dictionary.fusion:
Huh!?
Hey, you don't think that's
enough already, do you?
dictionary.summon:
Huh!?
I was summoned by you!?
How bothersome!

leader skill.desc: 戦闘開始から２ターン、攻撃力・防御力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 刹那の威圧

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１０連ダメージ
bb.name: ロックハーデス

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Lugina, a Summoner belonging to the Akras Summoners' Hall. Though his skills are often looked down upon due to his poor conduct, when he releases his true power he becomes one of the strongest in the whole of the Akras Summoners' Hall. He apparently defeated an evil god with an attack so powerful it shook the whole of Grand Gaia, but since no one was around to witness it many say Lugina simply exaggerated the story.
dictionary.evolution:
This is my true power!
Peel open your eyes and
gaze upon my glory!
dictionary.fusion:
Hey, you!
......Aha!
That's the stuff!
dictionary.summon:
It seems you've finally realized
just how awesome I really am!
Now pay your respects!

leader skill.desc: 戦闘開始から２ターン、攻撃力・防御力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 刹那の威光

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１６連ダメージ
bb.name: モルタ・スカイガーデン

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Lugina, a Summoner belonging to the Akras Summoners' Hall. After facing a demon disguised as his own self, Lugina was able to see his abilities and his personality anew with his very own eyes. After this incident he was able to awaken the dormant potential within himself, but no one is sure as to the reason behind it. Not only did his abilities on the battlefield grow, but his ability to make better judgement whilst in action also improved greatly. However, his personality remains as troublesome as ever, causing a great headache for the Summoners of the Hall as they try to pair him up with a willing partner.
dictionary.evolution:
I didn't evolve because of you!
I just happened to learn all over
again how awesome I really am!
dictionary.fusion:
Serving me well is about the only
good thing an idiot like you
seems capable of doing, huh?
dictionary.summon:
The more I fight
the more convinced I become
that I'm the best there is!

leader skill.desc: 戦闘開始から２ターン、攻撃力・防御力を１００％アップ＆ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減
leader skill.name: 刹那の天陣

sbb.desc: 敵単体に強力な樹属性２１連ダメージ＆自分のＢＢゲージを満タンにする＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
sbb.name: 叢覇刄

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１８連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを超絶増加＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をかなりアップ
bb.name: アルブ・スカイガーデン

extra skill.desc: ＢＢゲージが満タン時、攻撃力をアップ＆「覇竜剣『天魁』」を装備時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ
extra skill.name: 最強を継ぎし器

leader skill.desc: 戦闘開始から２ターン、攻撃力・防御力を１２０％アップ＆確率でダメージを軽減＆ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減
leader skill.name: 刹那の天龍陣

30236.name: 闘刄の神烈騎ルジーナ

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性２３連ダメージ＆自分のＢＢゲージを満タンにする＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与＆３ターン、防御力を大幅にアップ
sbb.name: ヴェーダ・レクストール

ubb.desc: 敵単体に超強力な樹属性５連ダメージ＆１ターン、自分の攻撃力を超絶アップ＆味方全体に１ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力を超絶アップ
ubb.name: 叢覇無刄『絶界』

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹・闇属性６連ダメージ＆確率で呪い状態にする
bb.name: 美しき花の世界

dictionary.description: The youngest of the Six Sibyl Sisters who fought against the gods in order to save the humans. It's said she was pure with a big, bright smile. She took great joy in protecting things precious to her and eventually teamed up with her sisters in fighting the gods in order to protect their far weaker human targets. However, she began to doubt their motives after learning that they would sometimes sacrifice the weakest among them in order to survive.
dictionary.fusion:
Your energy is so warm.
Hehe, this is nice!
dictionary.summon:
You thought I'd be smaller!?
Alright then, let me show you
what I'm really made of!

dictionary.description: The youngest of the Six Sibyl Sisters. Seeing how some humans would sacrifice their weaker allies for their own benefit she decided to stop protecting them and instead join the fight against them. She committed the same cruel acts against them that they seemed capable of committing against others. It's recorded that the innocent looking smile she wore as she stained the flowers she commanded red with blood led to her being particularly feared even among the other Fresh Blood Sisters.
dictionary.evolution:
My flower has turned red.
It's the color of human blood.
Heh, want to turn red yourself?
dictionary.fusion:
You remind me of the sun!
Are there really good humans?
Hmm...who knows!
dictionary.summon:
How conceited of you to
go and summon me!
I'm gonna tell my sisters!

dictionary.description: The youngest of the Six Sibyl Sisters. Paula could not understand why her older sister Zele was so bent on protecting the human race. She tried to make her understand that the weak would be sacrificed while humanity took its time to learn, but she was overwhelmed by the logic Zele presented.  However, as ruler of the silent flora, Paula chose force over diplomacy. Gathering power from the land by digging roots deep beneath the earth, she then sent blood-stained ivy vines after her beloved elder sister.
dictionary.evolution:
If your voice doesn't reach others,
then you should try another way.
I'll do my best!
dictionary.fusion:
You're a good listener.
I like you!
dictionary.summon:
My sister's a bit dense,
but I'll have her listen to me.
And you should help me!

dictionary.description: Zelban is famous for being the father of the Veda style of fencing. Having suffered a massive wound to his face in a championship battle when he was young, he covered it up with an iron mask. However, since different people named Zelban have appeared here and there throughout history, it is thought that his name has been handed down. It has also been recorded that the Zelban who appeared during the great war with the gods instructed Atro, one of the Six Heroes, in the way of the sword.
dictionary.fusion:
I've no interest in gaining
strength from humans!
However, I still must thank you.
dictionary.summon:
Of the many Zelbans who
have lived, you chose me.
You seem quite promising.

dictionary.description: Swordsmen by the name of Zelban have appeared several times throughout history. This particular one took part in the great battle with the gods. It's said the Zelbans before him preferred to fight alone, but he was different and instead fought alongside his comrades. There are many theories for why he did so, but a major document has him recorded as saying, "I didn't plan to fight with them. I simply got caught up in the same battle as them."
dictionary.evolution:
I've once again become stronger.
It seems the burdens I have born
have finally yielded me strength.
dictionary.fusion:
A Summoner making me strong...
Have I really strayed so far from
my fencing days in La Veda?
dictionary.summon:
The Zelbahn you summoned is
far stronger than all the rest.
You should be thankful to me.

dictionary.description: Swordsmen by the name of Zelban have appeared several times throughout history. This master of the Veda style of fencing took part in the great battle with the gods, almost defeating Melchio. But when a light from above restored the god to an even more destructive power, he cowered in fear. One of his comrades did the opposite, accusing him of being a Zelban imposter as she rushed at Melchio by herself. This awakened a new fighting spirit in him, as well as his memory of Veda's deadliest technique.
dictionary.evolution:
I may be a Veda master.
But I have a long way to go.
Don't give up your training, either!
dictionary.fusion:
My bonds with others are what
make me strong... It took me a
long time to realize that.
dictionary.summon:
I know it now more than ever.
The honor of the name Zelban.
Can you live up to it?

dictionary.description: An evil demon that lives in the forest who enjoys ensnaring humans in traps. It is easy to be fooled by their fairy-looking appearance, but they are actually a type of demon, and not fairies at all. What's more, there seems to be hostility between them and the fairies. Their cute exterior, beautiful voice, and the gentle smile they twirl about with makes most humans believe they were fortunate enough to meet a fairy. However, it is said that the body and soul of those who are taken by them to the depths of the forest are destroyed after a long time.
dictionary.fusion:
Thank you!
I want to repay you somehow,
so why don't you follow me...
dictionary.summon:
Hello!
Are you a Summoner?
You can count on me!

bb.name: カーズヴォート

dictionary.description: A wicked demon known as the leader of the Tinpalls. Although she seems very cute, this demon wields terrifying powers. Living in the depths of the forest, she spends her life toying with the humans the Tinpalls bring with them. It is said that when famous warriors and clergymen visit the forest, these demons seek them out in order to corrupt them. The fairies have long been their enemy, and they constantly fight each other in places unknown to humans.
dictionary.evolution:

I will do my best!

dictionary.description: An enchanted puppet with immense magical power. The man who despite being a magical being loved humans created it to protect his beloved daughter once he knew his own life was coming to an end. Despite being despised for being a half blood after her father's death, because Golem was always by her side no one ever attempted to harm the girl. Though as a puppet it was only intended to follow the girl's orders, it has been told that from its actions one could feel it had a strong will to protect her.

dictionary.description: An enchanted puppet with immense magical power. It was created to protect Lira, the girl with both human and magical blood. Golem watched over Lira from the time she was a baby, protecting her from the disastrous beast's fiery attacks. However, one day a bright light beamed out from inside of him, and with it a new power was born within him. There are many explanations concerning the light, with the most prominent one stating that it came from Lira's father whose spirit was still alive inside Golem.

dictionary.description: An enchanted puppet with immense magical power. Predicting the disastrous beast would come back, Lira, the puppet's master, studied her father's cherished book of magic and quickly began upgrading the puppet. However, these upgrades weren't to be used against the disastrous beast, but against the god army which had invaded in an attempt to destroy the humans. The fearsome stone giant protected the humans from the gods' attack and came to be known as one of humanity's saviors, though their are few who know who commanded it to protect the people.

dictionary.description: An enchanted puppet who saved the half-human and half-demon girl Lira. After its main body was destroyed, Lira transfused its soul into another vessel, in which Vars continued fighting for her until its very end. Afterwards, Lira took a piece of Vars with her and left the rest of its body to fall apart elsewhere. However, there is a legend that claims that when Lira was being helped by some air pirates to escape towards the new promised land, a colossal enchanted puppet came to her rescue. Some believe that this wasn't the work of the soul that had been originally infused to the enchanted puppet's body, but the will of Vars itself.

dictionary.description: A martial artist from the Toltya School of Martial Arts in the Sama Kingdom. In addition to the countless techniques he had at the command of his well-trained body, he also had the ability to manipulate people's vitality. Despite being one of the highest class fighters in his school, no longer satisfied fighting those around him he left in search of a stronger opponent. Wandering the lands he heard rumors of an evil demon, but on his way to investigate in the Bariura Empire he came across someone who would change his life forever.
dictionary.fusion:
That's it!
Great! Now let me show
you what I've got!

Hey there!
You look pretty strong!
Mind lending me a hand?

dictionary.description: A martial artist from the Toltya School of Martial Arts. Having headed towards the Bariura Empire in search of a good fight, he came across a girl who he instantly fell in love with. Ignoring her claims that she was nothing more than a mechanical doll, Dilma felt increasingly stronger for her. Then, with these feelings that he had never before felt in his life, Dilma ascended to a whole new level as a martial artist. He would then continue to perfect his techniques in fulfilling her wishes.
dictionary.evolution:
Wow!
My power is boiling over!
Now let me at him!
dictionary.fusion:
Now you got it!
Daily training is the secret
to my strength!
dictionary.summon:
Wow, you summoned me!
Now leave everything to me!
I'll give you the power you need!

dictionary.description: A martial artist from the Toltya School of Martial Arts. Experiencing a crushing defeat for the first time while on a quest for the girl of his dreams, he became irate with his own weaknesses. Returning to his old dojo, he immersed himself in his training again, this time discovering a new doctrine: devoting himself to others gave him a new kind of power. The war with the gods was commencing when he set out to find his love again. It is said that he saved countless lives with his new power and techniques.
dictionary.evolution:
Now I understand.
Power isn't just for attacking.
It's also vital for defense.
dictionary.fusion:
I can feel it!
My new power throbbing!
Get me to the battlefield now!
dictionary.summon:
Okay, lead the way!
Take me where my fists are needed.
They're ready!

dictionary.description: A good friend of Reed's, the soldier who led many civilians to El Gaia during the last stages of the war with the gods. He made plans to head for El Gaia to help his childhood friends, Reed & Lucana. It is said that he had a genius-like ability for magic paired with an amazing intellect, but that due to his cowardly personality was never able to release his true potential. However, while protecting the refugees from the god army's attacks he started having a change of heart, and meeting a certain person gave his powers the chance to bloom.
dictionary.fusion:
There's no point in using Fusion
on such a weakling like me...
dictionary.summon:
W-What's going on all of a sudden?!
D-Do you really think I'm good enough for this...?

dictionary.description: A good friend of Reed's, the soldier who led many civilians to El Gaia during the last stages of the war with the gods. Wishing to protect his comrades and the people with him, while traveling to El Gaia he was advised by Heavy God Nevsky to "trust in the eyes of those who relied on his power." Heeding this advice, his powers and genius for strategy grew exponentially. It is said that he used his magic to protect the people, while he cooperated with martial artist Rhein to create military strategies to keep the god army at bay.
dictionary.evolution:
I've decided
to have more confidence in myself.
Just like he told me to...
dictionary.fusion:
I'll get stronger
to protect everyone.
That's the path I chose!
dictionary.summon:
Someone trusts me.
It's a lot of pressure on me,
but it also gives me strength.

dictionary.description: A good friend of Reed's, the soldier who led many civilians to Elgaia during the last stages of the war with the gods. Moments after reaching Lucius's gate, Aneil saw that a large squadron of the God Army had been sent to thwart their escape. Claiming that this had been part of his strategy the whole time, he forced Reed and the others to cross the gate while he faced the incoming troops. The last account mentioning Aneil states that he had a faint smile on his face as the ground began to rumble beneath him while his enemies drew closer.
dictionary.evolution:
I will not falter. I have to do this!
I won't allow for any more
sacrifices to be made!

dictionary.description: One of the 12 Guardians of the Gods, guardians of the land of the gods. Born with great magical powers, her parents, who wanted her to use them justly, left her to the care of a priest. Though she learned to control her powers early on, she was still mentally unstable, often acting in ways which were hard for others to understand. This didn't change even after she joined the Guardians, and it's said she was often lectured by Lunaris.
dictionary.fusion:
Hey, what are you up to?
What was that just now?
Do it again, please!
dictionary.summon:
I'm Luly of the Guardians!
But what's a Guardian?
Do you know?
