bb.name: これが古の森の力よ！

dictionary.description: A talented magician and former Guardian who rebelled against the gods. When Sodis defected Luly was quick to offer help as she thought it might be fun. She saw all gods, humans, monsters, and even plants as equal, and it's doubtful she even understood what treason meant. Because of this it's said that even when her friends came to fight each other on the battlefield she was able to weild her magical powers without constraint, and enjoyed the battle from the bottom of her heart.
dictionary.evolution:
Huh? What happened?
I feel a bit better now.
I don't need an explanation.
dictionary.fusion:
That was cool!
Let me try next time!

dictionary.summon:
What a funny person, you are!
You're a Summoner? What's that?

dictionary.description: A destructive earth magic wielding former Guardian who rebelled against the gods. Having sided with Sodis as a trator against the gods, she battled fiercely with their pursuers. Declaring she was bored, she put the rest of her magic power into one final attack completely blowing away all of Alyut's followers. With only the 12 Guardians left, Luly sank to the ground with a discouraged look on her face where she gazed on as the others fought on.
dictionary.evolution:
What's this? Evolution?
Forget that, let's go somewhere
else and have some fun!
dictionary.fusion:
I'm bored.
Let's do something fun!
Mmm, I'm kind of hungry.
dictionary.summon:
I found a strong Summoner!
I wanna fight lots too, so pretty
please take me with you!

dictionary.description: Luly had been watching what had ensued on the battlefield when she suddenly smiled as she approached her former comrade, who had just lost his beloved. She smiled from ear to ear while looking at the knight of fire and his deceased lover, when she was suddenly struck down by him. The truth is that Luly had been blessed with incredible powers since birth thanks to her lineage. Belonging to a clan which had always served as part of the 12 Guardians of the Gods, Luly's family is said to have bolstered its demonic magical powers in order to attract suitable marriage partners to carry its bloodline.
dictionary.evolution:
I knew it!
I wasn't wrong!
I'm gonna have me some more fun!
dictionary.fusion:
Huh? This again?
I'm bored of this already.
Do you really wanna play that much?
dictionary.summon:
I heard a voice in my head.
It told me to release all my power.
And that's why I did!

extra skill.desc: 被ダメージが一定数を超える度に２ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力をかなりアップ
extra skill.name: 善意無き血統

leader skill.desc: 雷属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減＆樹属性ユニットの弱点属性ダメージを大幅にアップ＆攻撃ＢＢの威力をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 翡煌神の断罪

30316.name: 錬壊の翠法司ルーリー

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ・回復力に応じて防御力をかなりアップ・樹属性ユニットの攻撃力をアップ
sbb.name: 神壊の聖地

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な樹属性ダメージ（残りＨＰが多いほど、威力をアップ）＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力を超絶アップ
ubb.name: アーケイン・フェノーミナ

dictionary.description: This magical creature is said to systemize and store all Earth-related knowledge that Metal Units can hold within them. They seem to be able to communicate with Earth Ghosts, who are known for their reticence, solely by gaze. Due to that, they attempt to communicate by gaze with others as well, only ever saying "It's fine, it's fine. You don't have to say a thing." It has been said that gazing into one's eyes instills a sense of recognition and positivity. However, there are a few rare rumors saying that they don't really think of anything and have no intention of listening to anyone.
dictionary.summon:
Oh, a Summoner.
It's fine, it's fine.
You don't have to say a thing.

30324.name: 樹のクリスタルゴッド

dictionary.description: An incarnation of the power of Earth from another world. Legend has it these beings are the key to unlocking powers greater than those of the gods. Once there were gods from another world who gathered too much live flora together. The flora then gained a will of its own, and set out on a rampage. However, it proved to be too strong to be controlled and finally sought to destroy even its own self. Today, the earth is home to lots of living creatures, allowing their souls to eventually grow into an sublimated state onto a higher plane. If one is able to control the power of a Mecha God, the power of limitless Earth may become theirs.
dictionary.summon:
You summon the power of Earth...
Are you prepared to sacrifice
your own life?

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: フォリウムスカイ

dictionary.description: One of the 12 Guardians from a small remote nation. Having lived up to the expectations people held of her in her village of becoming a perfect warrior, it is said she avoided getting involved with others. Despite this, everyone admired her outstanding swordsmanship. Recently a diary has been discovered which is thought to have been written by her. It outlines the relationships between the other members of the 12 Guardians.
dictionary.fusion:
I've no need for charity.
I mean, excuse me...
Thank you for your assistance.
dictionary.summon:
Knights are to be chosen by
those who require their service.
I refuse all trivial requests.

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性７連ダメージ
bb.name: グラースケージ

dictionary.description: One of the 12 Guardians who desired to be a just warrior. When Alyut received orders to track and vanquish the traitors, she followed him without hesitation. It's said that the weight and speed of her polished blade techniques surprised everyone around her. She was eventually stopped from carrying out her duty by one of her former allies, Signas. Though their intense fighting lasted several days, it's said the two wore a smile on their faces the entire time.
dictionary.evolution:
Don't be mistaken.
I've only evolved to fulfill my duty.
It wasn't for your protection.
dictionary.fusion:
I will get stronger on my own.
However, I'm not so stubborn that
I'd refuse another's assistance.
dictionary.summon:
As a knight, I swear to
protect what is right and just.
That is why I exist.

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１０連ダメージ
bb.name: インフィニットリエール

dictionary.description: One of the 12 Guardians whose sense of righteousness led her to follow the gods. With no end in sight to her battle with Signas, their fight was interrupted by Grybe. Though as filled with rage as she was chasing after him as he fled, the fact that he showed no intent of harming her confused her. It is said that upon overcoming this confusion her powers grew stronger than ever, but what exactly she decided on is not recorded in her diary.
dictionary.evolution:
The shining treasure that lies
just beyond the forest of the lost.
That may just be what I found.
dictionary.fusion:
Do you enjoy being nosy?
You're just like them...
F-Forget what I said!
dictionary.summon:
I feel that maybe you lost something
you'd only just noticed was there.
I won't allow you that mistake again.

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を６５％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹統神の力

sbb.name: ユグドラシル

bb.name: インフィニットライズ

extra skill.name: 栄光の日々の証明

leader skill.name: 樹迅統神の力

30346.name: 叢迅の彗母神フィリア

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１９連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを超絶増加＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージを大幅に増加・ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をかなりアップ
sbb.name: ユグドラシル・エクステンド

ubb.name: 神誓覇迅『セフィロト』

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に水属性を付与
bb.name: グランドウェーブ

dictionary.description: A mild-mannered general of the Principality of Vriksha, who spent ages protecting the throne from the calamity of war. An excellent warrior, he was trusted by royalty and vassals alike. Some say that the otherworldly gunslinger Douglas was allowed to run wild because of Darvan's protection. He forged his greenish armor out of some materials he found deep in the woods, though even he was unaware of their secret capabilities.
dictionary.fusion:
Strength from others...
I won't say no, but
I'll have to think about it.
dictionary.summon:
Summoner!
Say no more.
My powers are yours.

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に水属性を付与
bb.name: クラックヘイル

dictionary.description: A mild-mannered general of the Principality of Vriksha, whose bolstered defenses, combined with Douglas' pulverizing attacks, drove the gods away time after time. The night before Douglas left to intercept the army of gods by himself, he confessed to Darvan that his armor was from another world. He also informed him that though Darvan could unleash his armor's full potential, controlling it would be a different ordeal altogether.
dictionary.evolution:
My armor's potential has been unleashed.
Can you handle it?
I should ask myself that too.
dictionary.fusion:
Ideas and principles...
they were meaningless in that war.
I know that now.
dictionary.summon:
No enemy army is too big.
I won't run away.
So neither should you.

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に水属性を付与
bb.name: テラフラッドマイン

dictionary.description: A mild-mannered general of the Principality of Vriksha, who was holding down the rearguard when he learned of his companion Douglas' demise on the battlefield. Remembering Douglas' last words about the true potential of his armor, he set it free, unleashing its power of Water in a one-man assault against the gods. Though he was able to force them to retreat temporarily, he hasn't been seen since.
dictionary.evolution:
I'll unleash it all!
Doesn't matter if it kills me.
Our path won't end here!
dictionary.fusion:
Growing further in tune
with my armor. It's what
I wanted, but feels weird.
dictionary.summon:
No matter what the reason,
aid must be repaid.
I'm right, am I not?

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ＆全てのユニットの最大ＨＰを１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光創神の力

sbb.desc: 敵単体に強力な樹属性１６連ダメージ＆高確率で怪我・麻痺状態にする＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に水属性を付与
sbb.name: 天地崩壊

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、全状態異常を無効・ターン毎にＨＰをかなり回復・ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
bb.name: 先輩！サポートしますね！

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Lin Merylham, the main operator of the Logistics Support Department in the Grand Gaia Survey Office Bureau of Investigation. Not a natural fighter by any means, her mock Unit was not created to exert brute force. Rather, it is said that she went to see Noel in order to ask him to model a supportive Unit after her. Angered by Lin's interruption, Noel is said to have agreed as long as it meant getting her out of his laboratory for good.
dictionary.fusion:
Huh? Oh my!
It seems like I've gotten stronger!
Thanks a lot, Summoner!
dictionary.summon:
Summoner!!
I'm here to be of your assistance,
so just say the word!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 通信士の愛心

bb.desc: 味方全体に３ターン、全状態異常を無効・ターン毎にＨＰを大回復・ＢＢゲージを大幅に増加
bb.name: 後方支援は任せてください！

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Lin Merylham, the main operator of the Logistics Support Department in the Grand Gaia Survey Office Bureau of Investigation. Though originally holding almost no power for purposes of the battlefield, Lin's mock Unit is equipped with a weapon from another world which is currently under research. Holding great destructive power, Lin persuaded Noel to allow her to equip such a weapon in order to be of better use to the Summoners of the Hall. However, Noel was ultimately dissatisfied with many things concerning this particular Unit. It is even rumored that he hid a secret within it.
dictionary.evolution:
I'll do my best for you, okay?
That includes support, of course!
dictionary.fusion:
You're giving me power?
I'm so happy! He he.
All right, I'll do my very best!
dictionary.summon:
Loading data...
Logistics support activated...
Ready for launch.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆ターン毎にＨＰを少し回復＆ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 通信士の恵愛

bb.name: 砲機兵『ゼイナス』

leader skill.name: 覇王の加護

bb.name: 砲滅機兵『ゼイナス-０５』

leader skill.name: 傀鋼神の硬砦

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性の一定ダメージ＆味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: 禁魔砲兵『ゼイナス-ＸＸ』

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力を３０％アップ＆スパークダメージを無効＆確率で被ダメージを２０％軽減
leader skill.name: 傀鋼神の耀塞

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１７連ダメージ＆味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減＆樹属性のバリアを付与
sbb.name: ユルティム＝エメス

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性７連ダメージ＆確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
bb.name: ブラットコメル

dictionary.description: A goddess that was once imprisoned for having committed a grave crime. This goddess, who took a disliking to the daily conduct of humans, joined forces with the goddess Phee in order to eliminate all humans by using carnivorous plants. She was imprisoned when she tried some of the plants above ground, causing great damage in the process. In the great war, she was promised her freedom if she lent her powers to eliminate humanity, a condition she agreed to happily in order to stand above ground next to her beloved older sister, Phee.
dictionary.fusion:
I can feel a new bud blooming...
I don't know if this is a secret human art or not,
but I sure can't mock it.
dictionary.summon:
In order to purify this land with my sister one more time,
I now answer to the human Summoners...

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
leader skill.name: 悪疫の波紋

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性９連ダメージ＆確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
bb.name: キルアルボル

dictionary.description: A goddess that was once imprisoned for having committed a grave crime. Tasked with the destruction of humanity during the great war, she fought as the spokeswoman for the flora that had been ignored and damaged by humans. She found the buildings made by humans "repulsive" and continued to destroy them. On the other hand, she revived the plant life in the many lands she conquered, making it carnivorous in order for it to be able to defend itself.
dictionary.evolution:
There is new life budding...
Does this mean that the world
has become beautiful and whole once again?
dictionary.fusion:
The flora is breathing...
I shall take this power
in order to build a utopia with my beloved sister.
dictionary.summon:
Let's make a promise to respect nature.
I shall only answer to the Summoner who keeps this promise.

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
leader skill.name: 悪疫の蔓延

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性１１連ダメージ＆確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
bb.name: カノナモムル

dictionary.description: A goddess that was once imprisoned for having committed a grave crime. She planted her carnivorous plants in the lands she had conquered, steadily helping to reduce the human population in those areas and resulting in Atharva Republic entrusting Goddess Emilia with her subjugation. However, Nalmika had grown too powerful thanks to all the surrounding land in her control and ultimately made a fool out of Emilia in battle. At that moment, a man screaming in a loud voice defended Emilia from her predicament, and Nalmika ended up leaving the battlefield disinterested in such disruptions.
dictionary.evolution:
So these elegant and large flowers have bloomed already...
Hehehe.
With these I can finally help my beloved sister again...
dictionary.fusion:
Did you see it?
The flora is blooming.
This is something you have accomplished.
dictionary.summon:
Summoner who brought me forth.
What do you seek from me?
The rebirth of this world? Or...?

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生＆スパークダメージを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 悪疫神の重激

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１４連ダメージ＆確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
sbb.name: 魔界樹ナルギマ

dictionary.description: These creatures are said to have come about as workers around the time of creation. A lonely sort, they are constantly seeking to bond with others and therefore fuse easily with their spirits. Their particular role is to create structure from formless matter. Once fused into others, they use this ability to give a permanent boost to the Rec of their hosts. Many are believed to reside inside Alpha Tree Altri, forming the source of the tree's healing power.
dictionary.summon:
You're all by yourself?
Aren't you lonely?
Need a friend?

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性９連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: バトルスティール

dictionary.description:
The wind that slips into the dark night doesn't let its target escape. Hiding himself in the shadows of the world, he slays all evils one by one. One can see the mantle that covers the mysterious thief Zelnite's face flutter in the wind. This is the story of the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite, who stole treasures and riches from the corrupted upper class of Grand Gaia in very flamboyant ways, to give to the poor and to orphanages.

(An excerpt from Chapter 1, Section 1 of "The Adventures of the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite!")
dictionary.fusion:
I can hear them...
The voices that call my name.
The voices that want to be stolen!
dictionary.summon:
The heavens, seas,
people and treasures all call to me.
They wanna see
the great thief Zelnite!

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ・ＨＣ・ゼル・カルマ・アイテム出現率をアップ
leader skill.name: 大怪盗の技巧

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１２連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージをかなり増加
bb.name: リディングレイジ

dictionary.description:
After slipping through countless traps, the thief Zelnite successfully penetrated the vault where the phantom treasure of the Bariura Empire was being guarded. However, in front of the door that guarded the treasure were two swordsmen as big as the door itself who released an eerie presence. How will he make it out of this one?! Find out next in The Adventures of the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite, Chapter 3!

(An excerpt from Chapter 2, Section 12 of "The Adventures of the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite!")
dictionary.evolution:
It's time for me,
the thief Zelnite, to shine!
All right, I'll lend you my power.
dictionary.fusion:
This power... Don't look away.
The moment you blink your eyes
it might be all over, you know!
dictionary.summon:
As long as villains exist,
I'll keep stealing from them.
A surprise from the great thief Zelnite!

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ・ＨＣ・ゼル・カルマ・アイテム出現率をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 怪盗神の技巧

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１４連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加
bb.name: コスモグリップ

dictionary.description:
After amazingly revealing the secret of the Bariura Empire, the thief Zelnite, who rescued the people, delved into the night with his mantle aflutter once again today. And thus, that is how the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite earned his status and his name. Well then, let's meet again soon in "The Adventures of the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite and the Princess of the Wind!"

(An excerpt from Chapter 3 of "The Adventures of the Chivalrous Thief Zelnite!")
dictionary.evolution:
All right!
I'll show you who the true Thief Zelnite is!
dictionary.fusion:
The identity of the thief Zelnite
is top secret in this world.
Got it?
It's our little secret.
dictionary.summon:
Seeking refuge in the darkness.
Burdened with moral obligation.
I'm the dazzling Thief Zelnite!

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ・ＨＣ・ゼル・カルマ・アイテム出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 怪盗神の秘術

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１７連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をアップ・アイテム出現率をかなりアップ
sbb.name: ゼルナイトの予告状

bb.name: インヴィジブルグリップ

extra skill.name: 瞳に映る真宝

leader skill.name: 大怪盗神の奥義

30446.name: 宝義の盗神ゼルナイト

sbb.name: 伝家の宝盗

ubb.name: その名は怪盗ゼルナイト

bb.name: スクラッチストライク

bb.name: クローストライク

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹創神の力

bb.name: スラッシュストライク

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 樹創神の力

bb.name: 自分の身は自分で守ります！

dictionary.description: The second princess of the Principality of Vriksha who fled after encountering an attack from the god army. Completely differing from her reserved elder sister, Princess Lidith, she was known for having a boisterous personality. Faris was willing to fight to the end once the principality started to crumble, but after speaking with her elder sister, she decided to flee with bodyguard Lario. Afterwards, Lario suffered an altercation while on duty, which drove them to escape. This only served to further damage her pride, leading her to draw her treasure sword to face off against the gods.
dictionary.fusion:
Hmm...
It's easier than I thought!
I'll forgive you for making me stronger.
dictionary.summon:
Summoner or not, you must
address me like a princess.
I'm not asking.
That was an order.

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の光

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性２０連ダメージ＆自分のＨＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: 私の剣技を見せてあげる！

dictionary.description: The extremely proud second princess of the Principality of Vriksha who was made to flee after the principality was invaded by the god army. At the time of the principality's collapse, she sought to escape with the badly wounded Lario, eventually reaching a gigantic forest where they were surrounded by pixies. Having sworn revenge against the god army, she decided to undergo sword training from a black armored knight wielding twin swords that had also been wondering the same forest. This helped her to awaken her abilities, while life in the forest put her heart at ease, somehow increasing the power of her precious sword.
dictionary.evolution:
I've been training so I'll
get stronger for sure!
I'll show you first!
dictionary.fusion:
Training is a pain, but
I think I feel stronger.
I wonder what summoning's like.
dictionary.summon:
Fine, I'll help you!
But just for a little bit!
Then you'll have to help me!

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の威光

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性３０連ダメージ＆自分のＨＣ出現率をアップ
bb.name: もう誰も傷つけさせない！

dictionary.description: The second princess of the Principality of Vriksha who sought to protect the faeries’ grove from the god army. After living in the forest, her heart full of vengeance changed, and she decided to protect the forest instead. However, the forest would also come to suffer an invasion from the god army. Always looking forward, she fought with her treasure sword in hand, releasing the tremendous power she had built up and defeating one god after another. Recent studies remark that the precious sword was once a present to the king of Vriksha from the pixie king for the purpose of protecting the forest. It is believed that once the princess took on that role, its true strength was unleashed.
dictionary.evolution:
I definitely feel power
coming from my sword.
These children's will.
I want to answer to it!
dictionary.fusion:
My will to save this forest
made my sword stronger.
But why is that?
dictionary.summon:
I don't know what my sister
expected from me.
But I know I'm on the right path!

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 戦神の覇光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性２０連ダメージ＆自分のＨＣ出現率を超絶アップ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
sbb.name: 宝剣よ、私に力を！

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復＆３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: 霊鳥のさえずり

dictionary.description: A girl who grew up in the forest, isolated from human contact. Having been raised in the forest, she shared the same heart with her animal friends, who continued to protect her always. One day while walking through the forest, she met a young girl who was as lovely as a flower, and opened up her heart to her. As the night drew closer, the young girl revealed that she was a goddess, promising to take care of Tia's friends from now on as well.
dictionary.fusion:
I must grow stronger to protect
the forest! I promised my friends
I would!
dictionary.summon:
I will never forgive the people
who dared to hurt my animal friends!

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をアップ
leader skill.name: 慈愛の心

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復＆３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: 森の主の恵み

dictionary.description: A girl who protected the forest with her animal friends. The forest in which she lived in was being gradually destroyed by the development of a nearby metropolis. Abhorred at the barbarisms being committed by humans against the forest, she watched as they tried to exterminate the forest animals with magical fire techniques. This fire would serve as the trigger that would unlock Tia's rage. Aching for retribution, a goddess bathed in blood appeared before her. It is said that the goddess invited her to destroy the humans together while smiling innocently.
dictionary.evolution:
I didn't get stronger alone.
We all got stronger together.
Hehe, thanks, everyone!
dictionary.fusion:
The forest... The animals...
I need power to protect them...
dictionary.summon:
You won't destroy the forest?
Well, if you say so...

leader skill.desc: ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 慈愛の真心

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復＆３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: 大自然の福音

dictionary.description: A girl who led the forest animals to fight alongside the God Army. As the enraged animals began attacking village after village, they ran into one of the Six Heroes, Vargas. Using his fire powers to keep the animals at bay, a furious Tia appeared before him. Although Vargas wanted to reason with her, the girl under divine protection delivered a serious blow against him. This made the hero finally realize that she really meant to fight him.
dictionary.evolution:
I can feel everyone's growth.
Hehe, it's great!
You should come along too!
dictionary.fusion:
I can feel your kindness.
Everyone...I wonder if it'd be okay
to trust this Summoner...
dictionary.summon:
I don't trust humans who
destroy the forest. But I feel like
I can trust you somehow...

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力を２５％アップ＆ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 慈愛の加護

sbb.name: みんなの力を貸して！

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１０連ダメージ
bb.name: 大車輪投げ

leader skill.name: 妖精の子

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に樹属性を付与＆１ターン、被ダメージを少し軽減
bb.name: ドリアード

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減＆ＢＢ発動時のＢＢゲージの消費量を少し軽減
leader skill.name: 妖精の子

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: スターライトソング

dictionary.description: A songstress who appeared from another world. Her voice is said to charm not only humans, but the monsters and gods that reside in Grand Gaia as well. Her existence was first discovered atop a peculiar stage which had been constructed in the depths of some ancient ruins. It is said that she was able to heal the souls of those consumed by their fighting spirit just by her voice and performance on stage. Another songstress was confirmed to have appeared at the same time as Miku, but her identity still remains a mystery.
dictionary.fusion:
Thanks for cheering me on!
I'll sing my heart out
for you!
dictionary.summon:
I'm so happy
to have met you.
Now, let's sing together!

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量を少しアップ
leader skill.name: ホーリーライブ

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性２７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: シャイニングステージ

dictionary.description: A songstress who appeared from another world. Her appearance was confirmed for a small period of time before and after the war with the gods. In that short time, she projected her overwhelming presence on her surroundings. Knowing that they could only hear her sing on a special stage built in the depths of some ancient ruins, many people from Grand Gaia gathered there to see her perform. An audience member is quoted as having said "Neither social status nor race mattered there. It was truly a utopia."
dictionary.evolution:
Things keep getting more exciting!
And to repay everyone's kindness,
this next song is for you!
dictionary.fusion:
Awesome!
I'll cheer everyone up
with my voice!
dictionary.summon:
Your voice has reached me!
Let's make this our stage.

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量を少しアップ
leader skill.name: ホーリーライブ

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性２７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: メロディークラウン

dictionary.description: A songstress who appeared from another world. With her pure and invigorating voice, she is said to have brought the withered flowers within the ancient ruins back to life with her melodious tunes. When she sang her departure song, she smiled as if having realized something, and shortly disappeared without a trace. After her audience was left wondering what had happened, they all came together to reach the same conclusion. And though the details of this particular conclusion are not well known, the fact that the negative effects of the war between the humans and the gods never reached the ancient ruins could provide a significant clue.
dictionary.evolution:
I can't stop singing!
Not until I can grant the wishes of
all those who hope for happiness!
dictionary.fusion:
There's something I wanna tell you.
Thank you for always
being by my side!
dictionary.summon:
I think meeting you was fated.
I know I'll be fine by your side!

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ＆ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減
leader skill.name: フューチャーライブ

30495.name: 聖歌神姫 初音ミク

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性３９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ・ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
sbb.name: スターライトメモリー

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に樹・水属性を付与
bb.name: サモンフェアリー

dictionary.description: A young noble born during the Amdahl Empire's Golden Age. A fan of fairy tales since he was young, he became a researcher of the spirit world. A practitioner of magic as well, it is said that he suddenly unlocked the ability to manifest creatures from his daydreams into reality. Though mere magic at first, his creations began gaining more substance, granting him powers very similar to those of a Summoner. However, this dark magic that opposes the principles of normal summoning practices still remains a mystery.
dictionary.fusion:
Hmm.
What?
Oh, I didn't mean anything by that.
dictionary.summon:
You summoned me?
Hmm... Well, whatever.
I'll help you for a little bit.

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減
leader skill.name: 王者の魔力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に樹・水属性を付与
bb.name: サモンガーディアン

dictionary.description: A young noble from the Amdahl Empire with the ability to materialize creatures from his imagination. Having inherited a certain territory from his father, he went to inspect its ruins only to find a demon he had never seen before residing within. Thinking this nest-building demon dangerous, he began a survey of the ruins immediately. At first, his heart pounded with excitement at the thought of adventure, but little did he know that this battle would last for numerous years to come.
dictionary.evolution:
Can you imagine my being?
How do I look like in your eyes?
dictionary.fusion:
What an annoying person.
Oh, never mind.
I just don't do well
with this distance between us.
dictionary.summon:
Fine. I'll lead your path.
I won't be held responsible
for whatever happens though.

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減
leader skill.name: 覇王の魔力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に樹・水属性を付与
bb.name: ギガントマキア

dictionary.description: A young noble from the Amdahl Empire with the ability to materialize creatures from his imagination. In his later years he wrote a story about a young man who was helped by mythical creatures while battling for his life in some ruins infested by an insect-shaped demon. This book is now considered a classic in Elgaia. The contents of the story are believed to be based on his real life experiences, but there is still little evidence to support this claim.
dictionary.evolution:
Has the power of your imagination
surpassed my own?
I'm curious about you now.
dictionary.fusion:
Once you get used to it,
this isn't half bad.
Looking forward to our next adventure.
dictionary.summon:
I'm not good at socializing.
But talking to you is not so bad.
We may even be friends.

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 神撃の魔力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に樹・水属性を付与・攻撃力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: ドラゴンズロア

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で怪我を発生する効果を付与
bb.name: ウッドブラスター

dictionary.description: An ancient dragon turned into an angry incarnation of the forest. With incredible intellect and amazing battle prowess, it is said that this dragon's power was only rivaled by the gods themselves. After engulfing Grand Gaia in absolute fear, it went into a long sleep from which it was awakened again in Bariura, where the war with the gods would begin. Once it woke, it destroyed a small country in its proximity in an instant. Some say that the dragon acted on its innate instinct to destroy the humans who had mistreated the forest, but others claim that the creature was manipulated by a demonic being. The truth still remains a mystery.
dictionary.fusion:
My power is returning to me...
The abilities of humans should be
feared throughout the ages...
dictionary.summon:
I have been awaken once more...
But I am without will.
I can only pledge myself to you, Summoner.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力・最大ＨＰを１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 王者の霊力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で怪我を発生する効果を付与
bb.name: ルストブレス

dictionary.description: An ancient dragon that awoke in Bariura. As Farvnil continued with its disastrous rampage, a young woman appeared to confront it stating that if the dragon indeed possessed any intelligence, then it would know to use its words before diving into a fight. Perplexed by not only her words, but her fearlessness in his presence, it calmed down for an instant. However, at that very moment another human sought this opportunity to attack Farvnil, gravely injuring it. Driven mad with anger, the ancient creature gained even more power than before thanks to a dark presence by its side.
dictionary.evolution:
I won't forgive...you human...
My body...my soul...
To have to give myself to this world...
dictionary.fusion:
My soul won't heal at this rate...
Human...
Sacrifice more souls to me...
dictionary.summon:
I will not pledge myself to a human.
However, my will is absent.
Human wisdom is an abomination.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の霊力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で怪我を発生する効果を付与
bb.name: エメラルドボルグ

dictionary.description: An ancient dragon that turned into a more evil form after receiving power from a demon. In exchange for the great power it had received it lost its mind, driving it to act upon its hatred of humans alone. As it gradually lost itself, the humans that had once faced it appeared anew to challenge the ancient dragon once more. However, Ragshelm could feel that the Phoenix Knight sought vengeance no more, but instead looked towards the future through the power of his sword. Some say that in response to this Ragshelm unleashed all the power it possessed.
dictionary.evolution:
Can't you see it...?
Can't you...hear it...?
I am...already...
a...calamity...
dictionary.fusion:
Grr...gruhh...roar...
I...destroy...everything...
Rooaaar!!!
dictionary.summon:
I shouldn't...have...woken...
My...madness...
The people...run...

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆確率で防御貫通効果を付与
leader skill.name: 破壊神の霊力

30515.name: 緑樹竜神ラグシェルム

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１８連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力・防御力を２ターン低下＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で怪我を発生する効果を付与
sbb.name: タイラントブレス

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１７連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力・防御力を１ターン低下＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で怪我を発生する効果を付与
bb.name: エメラルドレイジ

dictionary.description: After going mad with demonic power, Ragshelm's rampage was momentarily stopped by a knight wielding a blade of fire. Unfortunately, it wasn't long before the demonic power within the ancient dragon retook control over its body, and the destruction began once again. Ragshelm somehow in Ishgria along with all the beings that had surrounded him, destroying everything in its path. This is said to have taken a toll on its body, which led the dragon to its own ruin. However, it is unknown whether or not the warriors the ancient dragon fought against were by it side when this happened.
dictionary.evolution:
The...demonic power...within me...
Makes...me...destroy...
You...bear...the power...of chaos
dictionary.fusion:
More... Test...my...limit...
I shall...satiate...
Your thirst...for...power...
dictionary.summon:
His fire...destroyed me...once...
But I...was...resurrected...
And fell...into darkness...anew...

extra skill.desc: ＢＢ及びＳＢＢに「味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与」を追加＆状態異常の敵へのダメージを大幅にアップ
extra skill.name: 暴竜の咆哮

leader skill.name: 崩樹竜神の霊瘴

ubb.name: 崩界の煉瘴気

bb.name: ヴァラ・シル

leader skill.name: 銀の鋭光

bb.name: エステル・カラド

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＨＰを少し回復＆低確率で被ダメージを超絶軽減
leader skill.name: 金の輝環

bb.name: ルーイナスドライヴ

leader skill.name: 魔導王

bb.name: エンシェントカタストロフィ

leader skill.name: 魔導王

bb.name: ルーイナスドライヴ・極

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを５０％アップ＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
leader skill.name: 狙い鋭き魔術蜂

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎・水・樹・雷属性ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ
sbb.name: Ａ・カタストロフィ・極

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性２０連ダメージ
bb.name: 剣舞・薔薇ノ舞

dictionary.description: A young girl who loved flowers, and was in turn loved by the gods. At first, she was an ordinary girl who lived in a village near Mistral. It is said that she gained her powers when she headed towards the Tower of Trials where the gods lived, and spoke directly to them. Although there are no reliable sources that confirm this, some believe that she was the queen of a small ruined country who sought power in order to save her sick mother. There are many theories surrounding the identity of the gods she served.
dictionary.fusion:
Thank you.
A blossom well taken care of
blooms into a beautiful flower.
dictionary.summon:
I'm thankful for this wonderful
encounter. Let's pour love into this bud,
and bloom it together.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の煌めき

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性２５連ダメージ
bb.name: 剣舞・荊棘ノ舞

dictionary.description: A young girl carrying the banner of the God Army. Though it is believed she was an ordinary human, there are no detailed records concerning this, nor the gods that had employed her services. The only thing that remains is the impression she left on others as her beautiful figure surrounded by flowers carried the banner of the God Army. Being a human, she was placed in the rear of the army when the war broke, but the humans' resistance proved too much for the God Army. It was then when she took up arms and made her way to the frontline, fighting with ferocious will.
dictionary.evolution:
Take a look at this flower.
This is the beautiful flower
we have bloomed together.
dictionary.fusion:
Your powers make flowers bloom.
You are quite a lovely person.
dictionary.summon:
Don't worry about me.
Send me to the battlefield.
Let me show you what I'm capable of.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の閃光

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性３０連ダメージ
bb.name: 秘剣舞・繚乱ノ舞

dictionary.description: A young girl carrying the banner of the God Army. Her father had been the ruler of a small kingdom, but he was betrayed by his vassals, who took his country from him. As a member of the God Army, her attitude completely changed when they attacked her mother country, and she became consumed by a terrifying disposition. However, there are many who doubt that she fought for revenge, claiming that a lot of fiction has been tangled with fact over the years.
dictionary.evolution:
The blossom you cared for
has come to full bloom.
Pretty, don't you think? Hehe.
dictionary.fusion:
When the flower of life withers away,
do you know what sound it makes?
dictionary.summon:
It looks like a flower
is blooming in your heart too.
I can tell these things.

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＢゲージを少し増加・ダメージを７５％アップ
leader skill.name: 閃統神の重激

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージを大幅にアップ
sbb.name: 神剣舞・百花繚乱ノ終舞

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で毒・弱体・呪い・麻痺を発生する効果を付与
bb.name: ローゼ・スピネル

dictionary.description: A disciple who once served Cardes the Malevolent. Possessing the ability to manipulate the spirits found in plants and nature, it is rumored that her passive abilities were on a phenomenal level. However, being a sensitive introvert she had low self-confidence, and disliked using force against others. Due to her particular personality and the amazing powers she held, she was despised by a multitude of gods. It is believed that Cardes intervened in many of the unwanted disputes she had with various gods, helping her escape from them.
dictionary.fusion:
I'm grateful for this power, but
I don't wanna fight needlessly...
Is that too much to ask?
dictionary.summon:
What?
You summoned me?
Wow, I'm so happy that you need me...

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
leader skill.name: 悪疫の蔓延

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で毒・弱体・呪い・麻痺を発生する効果を付与
bb.name: ローゼ・ヴェノム

dictionary.description: A former disciple of Cardes the Malevolent. Cardes planned to use Tora's special abilities to carry out a special ritual which required numerous sacrifices. However, Tora refused to take part in such cruel acts and was branded as a traitor. This, along with Zebra's false accusations against her, is believed to have been a trick by Cardes, who actually feared her awesome power. Although some accounts claim that this ploy was devised by a different god. Tora was able to escape the clutches of the wicked Fallen God, but ran into a barrier created by a high ranking god shortly afterwards.
dictionary.evolution:
I know I'm stronger than this...
But...this is the best I can do for now.
Please forgive me...
dictionary.fusion:
You make me so happy!
But please...gimme a bit more time
before sending me out there...
dictionary.summon:
Because I was being a brat
I ended up causing trouble for others...
I'll try harder from now on!

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生＆確率でＨＰを少し吸収
leader skill.name: 悪疫神の奪魂

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１５連ダメージ（ダメージの一部を吸収）＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で毒・弱体・呪い・麻痺を発生する効果を付与
sbb.name: 幽魔棘の檻

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で毒・弱体・呪い・麻痺を発生する効果を付与
bb.name: ローゼ・ナイトメア

dictionary.description: A disciple who was sealed in Ishgria. After running away only to end up in the domain of a high ranking god, she was assaulted by a disciple wielding both a sword and a lance. Hoping to avoid a fight Tora tried running away unsuccessfully, finding herself trapped within a barrier. Another disciple who grew frustrated with her attempts to escape revealed that the place they found themselves in was one meant to seal disciples who had committed grave crimes, adding that the barrier would not be dispelled until a single disciple defeated the rest. Watching as the rest of the prisoners in the barrier fought tenaciously against each other, Tora finally decided to fight for her own self.
dictionary.evolution:
Ahhh, that was lovely.
Releasing one's true self
is really a wonderful thing, isn't it?
dictionary.fusion:
He he he.
Now I really know how you feel about me.
I'm so happy!
dictionary.summon:
I betrayed Lord Cardes's expectations.
But even so, I...!
No, it's too late now, right...?

extra skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
extra skill.name: 汚染された紫闇

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生＆ＨＰを少し吸収
leader skill.name: 悪疫統神の奪魂

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１８連ダメージ（ダメージの一部を吸収）＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で毒・弱体・呪い・麻痺を発生する効果を付与
sbb.name: 幽魔蝕棘の禁獄

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な樹属性２２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、全状態異常をランダムに発生する効果を付与・被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
ubb.name: ヴェスパージェイド

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎・水・樹・雷属性１０連ダメージ
bb.name: 四奉剣『クライドル』

dictionary.description: One of the sacred Guardians of Meirith, who worshipped the Holy Emperor Karna Masta in the La Veda Republic. Originally an adventurer who traveled from place to place, he was appointed as a sacred guardian by one of his predecessors, and therefore joined the Guardians of Meirith. Possessing great skill with the sword, he had a strong sense of justice along with a bright personality, making him a leader figure within the group. His place of origin remains unknown, he himself never mentioning anything about his background. However, since he would sometimes say things that reminded his partners of the transience of human life, some speculate he was high-born.
dictionary.fusion:
The wind's direction has changed...
How interesting.
Well, what now then?
dictionary.summon:
You summoned me here?
Your eyes are intriguing...
Okay, I'll fight for you.

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎・水・樹・雷属性１３連ダメージ
bb.name: 四奉晃剣『バスティール』

dictionary.description: One of the sacred Guardians of Meirith. Receiving a sylvan sword from Karna Masta, he was then sent on a demon slaying mission by the gods, borrowing their power and then setting off to Ishgria with his comrades. Fighting countless demons along the way, Quaid's powers grew as great as those of the gods themselves. After some time, one of the Guardians received word that the Holy Emperor was being targeted by a group of dissenters. Separating into different factions to deal with the situation, Quaid made the decision to stay in Ishgria.
dictionary.evolution:
You're a curious one. It's like
you're inviting me to a new world.
I won't let you down!
dictionary.fusion:
That was nice! Hahaha.
All right, I'm ready to go now!
What's our next mission?
dictionary.summon:
The wind feels so nice here!
Don't worry, I'm ready.
Let's go off on a new adventure!

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ＆ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 五光勇神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹・光・闇属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、攻撃に炎・水・樹・雷属性を付与
sbb.name: クロスタービュランス

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎・水・樹・雷属性１５連ダメージ
bb.name: 四皇烈剣『ヴァル・ニルス』

dictionary.description: One of the sacred Guardians of Meirith. The reason why Quaid decided to stay behind in Ishgria was because there were still demons present which wanted to invade Grand Gaia, and because he believed his friends would protect Karna Masta. Just before the decisive battle against the demons, he told his dear friends to return home, which made them all furious. Moved by their concern for his well-being, Quaid set off to the battlefield smiling, though the result of the fight remains unknown. There are currently no records left behind about his party's return to Grand Gaia, nor about a demon invasion afterwards.
dictionary.evolution:
Don't worry, I'm here.
I'll always be by your side.
It's what I want, after all.
dictionary.fusion:
I couldn't do anything back then,
but I won't chase my past anymore.
I'm grateful for your help!
dictionary.summon:
I can't let down the friends
who helped me get this far.
I want to protect everyone!

extra skill.desc: 残りＨＰが少ないほど攻撃力・防御力・回復力を超絶アップ
extra skill.name: 不撓不屈

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を１００％アップ＆ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
leader skill.name: 五光勇神の心魂

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹・光・闇属性１７連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、攻撃に炎・水・樹・雷属性を付与
sbb.name: デルタホライズン

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な樹属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数をかなり増加・攻撃に全属性を付与
ubb.name: 六聖天絶

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性７連ダメージ＆確率で弱体・呪い状態にする
bb.name: ドライアンゲスト

dictionary.description: Creatures native to Ishgria which resemble tiny humans. They always travel in groups, with each member wielding its own weapon. The Kobolta are very protective of their territory, attacking any intruders in their lands, though they seldom stir conflict outside of it. Not many details are known about these creatures, but it is believed that they have developed their own language to communicate amongst themselves, and thus a study is being conducted on the subject.
dictionary.fusion:
Gigaga go gagage gegege gago ga?
Gigi gogogo ga gega.
Goggogyo gugi gega gogu.
dictionary.summon:
Gongaga gage ga!
Gogega gi gagu gogigo.
Gingen gi gagoga gegu!

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの気勢

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性９連ダメージ＆確率で弱体・呪い状態にする
bb.name: クイントアヴァランチ

dictionary.description: Creatures native to Ishgria which resemble tiny humans. As soon as a strong enemy steps into their territory, they call their comrades to form a strong resistance against incoming attacks. Though their battle power is often underestimated due to their small size, the Impal are astute creatures which can tell their opponents' weak points at a glance, subsequently emerging victorious from battle moments later. Curiously, the face carved on the staff the Impal leader wields in battle represents one of their deities, whom they offer thanks to once they have claimed victory on the battlefield.
dictionary.evolution:
Gogage gagi, gige gegega ga!
Gingen giguga gaggegi gagge...
Gugu, gugogi gogugu gogi gegige ga.
dictionary.fusion:
Gogo, gigaga gagagi gugu gu!
Gagogin gengogo gage gogo gega.
Gugogi ga gyogu gyogu gigegagu ga.
dictionary.summon:
Gyogan gi gagagan gogo guga.
Goge gagi gagi goga giginga.
Gogo gogagyo gigage gige guge!

leader skill.desc: ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの気勢

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをアップ
bb.name: バオムクリーヴ

dictionary.description: A beast-like youngster who traveled to Grand Gaia in the midst of the war against the gods. As Mau journeyed in search of the missing young lady who had served as his patron, he became the target of many attacks due to his unusual appearance. However, using his unique body to the best of his ability, he never allowed for any of his enemies to touch a hair on his head. Mau would later come to face Zegar in battle in the Agni empire, but the reason for their altercation is unknown. The last thing known about Mau is that he helped those who had been attacked by the God Army before he mysteriously disappeared.
dictionary.fusion:
There are lots of people after me.
But I'm way too smart
to lose to those dummies!
dictionary.summon:
Need more power for journey.
To train, I fight with you.
I help you!

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を少し軽減
leader skill.name: 森獣の魔力

bb.desc: 敵単体に樹属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをアップ
bb.name: アルベロクリーヴ

dictionary.description: A beast-like youngster who crossed over to the strange land of Ishgria. After he left Grand Gaia without a trace, his presence was confirmed in Ishgria, where he continued his travels. At first Mau believed he had simply stumbled upon a different region of Grand Gaia, unaware of the fact that he had traveled to a different world. However, as he fought fearsome beasts and demons while roaming Ishgria, it is said that Mau felt sort of nostalgic about the unfamiliar place he found himself in.
dictionary.evolution:
I have new power!
Me so happy.
I can continue journey now!
dictionary.fusion:
I keep getting stronger.
Give me more, more power!
I fight for you!
dictionary.summon:
You summon me,
so I come here.
I fight, no problem!

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を少し軽減
leader skill.name: 森王の魔力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: 翠法魔旋

dictionary.description: An ancient demon who came to be called a "hermit." Showing great potential since his youth, many of the old Ishgria war tales left behind mention Oguro's name. One tells of how he managed to repel a dragon housing the anger of the earth within it, a story passed down amongst demons throughout each generation. However, he achieved the true extent of his strength when he managed to come into old age, a feat almost unheard of for demons. It was then that he attained the spirit, technique, and physical ability that so many demons are said to have feared.
dictionary.fusion:
Is the act of receiving compensation
really this ugly?
No matter, I'll accept.
dictionary.summon:
Meaningless encounters and partings
happen endlessly in our lives.
That is our greatest penance.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 絶神の聖域

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
bb.name: 翠蓮操魔旋

dictionary.description: A demon once followed by many others of his kind who ruled over a large territory. A sage with ever growing power and influence, it was said that eventually he would come to rule the whole of Ishgria. However, thinking it all too boring, Oguro began to lose interest in all the demons who had pledged themselves to him. His only interest became the presence of a young demon who looked up to him, meaning to steal his wisdom.
dictionary.evolution:
Hear me, you superficial fool. Don't
think you can grasp real strength
outside the battlefield.
dictionary.fusion:
What will you do after lusting for
power? The only thing that awaits
is meaningless fighting.
dictionary.summon:
Ease is the braggarts' drive and
that of those who dance for them.
Their audience is no different.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを少し増加
leader skill.name: 絶神の聖咆

sbb.desc: 敵単体に強力な樹属性１５連ダメージ＆自分のＢＢゲージを満タンにする＆３ターン、自分の攻撃力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: 幻永黄纏

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
bb.name: 滅塊・翠蓮叢魔旋

dictionary.description: A demon once followed by many others of his kind who ruled over a large territory. There was a young demon he had instructed himself, far excelling the rest of his peers, who hatched a plan to steal Oguro's position. Having lost his desire to rule long ago, Oguro stepped down from his position quietly, relocating to a land far away and beginning a life of seclusion. There are no more records about him after that, but according to oral accounts, he began his pursuit of knowledge and power once again.
dictionary.evolution:
Listen, you careless fighter.
There is no enemy to fight.
Knowing that is the first step.
dictionary.fusion:
Can you see past power?
Do you see a bright future ahead?
If you do, I shall stay a bit longer.
dictionary.summon:
That creature was quite interesting.
Having such pure aspirations,
and yet nothing to hide.

extra skill.desc: ＢＢゲージが満タン時、攻撃力をかなりアップ
extra skill.name: 肉体を超越せし精神

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 絶神の聖激咆

sbb.desc: 敵単体に強力な樹属性１７連ダメージ＆自分のＢＢゲージを満タンにする＆３ターン、自分の攻撃力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: 天塊・幻永神纏

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な樹属性２２連ダメージ＆３ターン、自分の攻撃力を超絶アップ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
ubb.name: 無劫の理

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: グリプスブリーズ

dictionary.description: A dual-wielding swordsman who once fought alongside the Oracle Knight against the gods who sought to destroy humankind. Though originally a very skillful and prominent knight in Vriksha, he suddenly gave up his post to go on a journey of learning. The reason behind his decision remains unclear, but it is highly speculated that he grew bored once no more worthy rivals were to be found. As he proceeded with his journey, he slayed countless demons, though it is said that he always showed an expression of disappointment once the fighting was over, promptly moving on to the next region.
dictionary.fusion:
This is pointless...
I'm already strong.
More power is unnecessary.
dictionary.summon:
You want to use my powers?
All right.
Just don't bore me to death.

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージを大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の覇刃

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: グリプスゲイル

dictionary.description: A dual-wielding swordsman who once fought against the gods alongside the Oracle Knight. Dion had never lost a battle until he met the Oracle Knight during his travels. Sensing that the Knight was a warrior of true ability, Dion challenged him to a duel in which he lost terribly. Afterwards, Dion pursued the Oracle Knight, challenging him to a duel every chance he got, until a young fox-girl got in the way. It wasn't until the Oracle Maiden intervened that both Dion and the fox-girl decided to join the Oracle Knight in his god slaying mission.
dictionary.evolution:
This sense of satisfaction...
It's been a while. Does it mean
this is what I've been looking for?
dictionary.fusion:
At this rate, I still won't be able
to beat him. Can't you...
Can't you give me more power?
dictionary.summon:
The world is wide, and in it
there was someone who defeated me.
Heh, how funny.

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージを大幅にアップ＆樹・雷属性の弱点属性ダメージをかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の輝刃

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力をアップ
sbb.name: 碧双嵐の計

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を超絶アップ
bb.name: グリプステンペスト

dictionary.description: A dual-wielding swordsman who once fought alongside the Oracle Knight. Drawing the enemies' attention with his tenacious attacks as he and his comrades faced off against the gods, he created opportunities for his friends to strike back. However, a counterattack from one of his opponents left him with a fatal wound. Even so, Dion still risked his life to save the Oracle Knight before he was dealt a devastating blow. Getting back on his feet, he suffered blow after blow until the Oracle Maiden sought to stop him. It is said that at this time he showed a smile that had never been seen on his face before as he got up to fight once again.
dictionary.evolution:
It's because I learned to find
satisfaction outside of battle,
that I was able to become stronger.
dictionary.fusion:
Keep moving forward, you say?
All right then. After all,
being with you is not such a bore.
dictionary.summon:
To think I could reach this level...
I guess I should thank her
for the opportunity to grow.

extra skill.desc: クリティカルダメージをかなりアップ
extra skill.name: 騒嵐疾駆

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージを大幅にアップ＆樹・雷属性の弱点属性ダメージを大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の天輝刃

30606.name: 嵐薙の双颯神ディオン

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１７連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: 碧貴天脈の計

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な樹属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージを超絶アップ
ubb.name: 烈帝陣・碧纏咲嵐

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１０連ダメージ＆３ターン、ターン終了時に追加ダメージ
bb.name: 二刀流『裂風旋』

dictionary.description: A type of swordsman known as a "samurai" from another world. Known as the "Dual Blade Conqueror," he was an undefeated warrior in his home world. There he traveled to various lands in search of a certain demon blade, though to no avail. One day he heard a rumor which claimed that the owner of the demon blade had mysteriously disappeared, and thus he set off in that very direction. On his way there, he passed by a castle emanating an enormous power. One legend claims that he was drawn into a void by the colossal power, while another claims that he cut his way through the castle willingly, disappearing into another world.
dictionary.fusion:
Gaining power at the expense of
others. This summoning technique
mirrors that of the demon blade.
dictionary.summon:
I don't care who you are, just give
me a strong opponent to fight.
It'll draw the demon blade out.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１３連ダメージ＆３ターン、ターン終了時に追加ダメージ
bb.name: 飄・二刀流『乱裂旋』

dictionary.description: A dual-blade samurai from another world. After using his own powers to arrive to Grand Gaia, Toutetsu saw that a large number of God Army troops were awaiting him. He immediately began to cut down all gods in sight, but failed to notice that someone had been wounded behind him. Unable to leave the dual blade knight in black armor alone after spotting him, Toutetsu left him in the care of the surrounding pixies there. He then tried to head towards the next battlefield when a gate suddenly opened before him, and flung him into yet another world. It is said that countless demons lay before his eyes on the other side of the gate.
dictionary.evolution:
A sharp blade invisible to the eye.
Whoever makes that their true nature
will become truly strong.
dictionary.fusion:
Every day, I feel death creep closer.
That's why I've grown stronger.
Have you thought of death?
dictionary.summon:
"Castle Slasher" is a stupid moniker.
The pride of a samurai is in
cutting down foes, not things.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を４０％アップ＆ＨＰが満タン時、攻撃力を少しアップ
leader skill.name: 列迅将の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１６連ダメージ＆３ターン、確率でターン終了時に追加ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をかなりアップ
sbb.name: 閃の二業『清錬狂剱』

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン終了時に追加ダメージ
bb.name: 飄剱・二刀流『天裂旋』

dictionary.description: A dual-blade samurai from another world. Though many scholars disagree with the reason why Toutetsu was after the demon blade, the most influential of them believe it was because he had been cursed by it. As he came to be feared by the demons of Ishgria while continuously slaying them in large numbers, one day he felt that his life was suddenly at an end. The demon blade had been destroyed in another world. Once he knew, it is said he smiled wholeheartedly while proclaiming that the meaning of his life could only be found in death.
dictionary.evolution:
I can feel my soul elevating...
I won't have an easy death,
but I will harness this power!
dictionary.fusion:
The strength to face a painful death
became my wish after I was cursed.
My soul is far from free.
dictionary.summon:
A person's value is in their death.
That's why immortality is worthless.
It disturbs one's growth.

extra skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＢゲージを少し増加
extra skill.name: 散り際の本懐

dictionary.description: A Summoner who served the Akras Summoners' Hall since its establishment. Being a noble of the Randall Empire, Libera served in the Imperial Guard until one day she suddenly gained summoning powers, and decided to join Summoners' Hall against the wishes of her family. Tired of acting like a pretty toy soldier, she joined the Hall to prove herself actually useful. She was subsequently disowned by her family, but nevertheless continued training in order to fulfill her ambitions, eventually achieving the rank of Demon Slayer squadron commander.
dictionary.fusion:
H-Hey! Look away!
I don't like it when people
watch me go through fusion...
dictionary.summon:
Huh? Is this the...?
Oh well, who cares.
Let's do this!

bb.name: フェアリーブロウ

dictionary.description: The former commander of the now defunct 8th Squadron of the Demon Slayers. There are records which state that while Libera was surveying the Vriksha region, she left information behind regarding the territorial dispute among the Four Fallen Gods, and about demons. When considering the fact that the region she was surveying was under the control of Afla Dilith, one can truly appreciate the level of expertise Libera used to complete the task. It is safe to say that the Summoners of Old owe their knowledge of Grand Gaia's current state to her incredible efficiency.
dictionary.evolution:
I have to change.
It wouldn't be fair to stay the same
after all I've sacrificed!
dictionary.fusion:
Didn't you hear me?!
I said, I don't like it when people
watch me go through fusion!!
dictionary.summon:
Surveying Grand Gaia was fun.
There were lots of scary enemies,
but we made some great finds too!

dictionary.description: A Summoner selected to join the covert "Ishgria's Recon Squad." The squadron of seven members left for Ishgria under the orders of the Summoners of Old, but separated from its commander during the early stages of its mission. After being attacked by a ferocious beast, three members fled to safety only to encounter yet another powerful demon. Libera entrusted a portion of her land survey reports to one of the members with her, and then proceeded to carve an escape route with Krantz. However, little did she know that the last member would never make it back to Elgaia, for the whole squadron would be annihilated.
dictionary.evolution:
Tell me our next strategy!
I will show you the new powers
I gained through evolution!
dictionary.fusion:
Fine, I guess...
If you really wanna watch...
No! I just can't do it!!!
dictionary.summon:
I wonder how that kid is doing.
Such a scaredy cat...
But still a cutie! Hehe.

dictionary.description: Wielder of the Sacred Blade. Long before the great war with the gods began, a demon appeared in Grand Gaia. Taken by surprise, the gods attempted to slay it, but the wounded demon got away and subsequently attacked a town nearby. It was then when a goddess appeared and bestowed the Sacred Blade upon the hero Duran, who finally defeated the demon. However, the Sacred Blade held powers that frightened even the gods, which means that Duran was quite the formidable human if he was able to wield it.
dictionary.fusion:
This is too easy,
and therein lies its faults.
I advise you don't overdo it.
dictionary.summon:
If you like, I will defeat
our enemies by your side.
After all, that is my role.

bb.name: ラヴィジ・ロード

dictionary.description: Wielder of the Sacred Blade. Deeming Duran's immense power as unsuitable for a mere mortal to handle, the gods not only sought to take the Sacred Blade from him, but also to punish the goddess who had granted it to him. Duran instead used the sword to protect the goddess as an act of appreciation towards her, slaying demon after demon in her name. However, fearing this power of his that transcended that of the gods themselves, he decided to seal it away with a strong warning so that future generations could not use it for evil purposes.
dictionary.evolution:
When we gain power, our relationships
with others change. Can you keep
being yourself? We'll have to see.
dictionary.fusion:
Don't think this technique can give
you true power. That misunderstanding
could make you very unhappy.
dictionary.summon:
A power that drives the ego mad.
Only those who can control it
can use the Sacred Treasures.

dictionary.description: Wielder of the Sacred Blade. Before the Sacred Blade was sealed away, the brother of the demon Duran had once defeated came after him to avenge his sibling. Curiously, the Sacred Blade resonated with the demon's power during their battle, making it shine even brighter. The contest itself was so fierce that it is said even the gods who were after Duran and the goddess cowered in fear at the sight of it. After it was all finished, the gods gave up on their attempt to punish the pair, but not long after that the power of the Sacred Treasure they shared was sealed away by a certain family.
dictionary.evolution:
So you'll just keep going forth...?
Very well then,
I shall lend you my heroic power!
dictionary.fusion:
I will no longer lecture you.
I will just be grateful for
the power you have granted me.
dictionary.summon:
I don't know what that person was
thinking, but it saved many lives.
That's all that matters.

dictionary.description: A warrior from another world guided by the Chain Chronicle. Having been born from both human and Sea Breeze tribe origins, Lindsey is a half-human who strongly resembles a wildcat both in appearance, and in her incredible speed on the battlefield. She usually wears her totem's ears to cover the shape of her own unusually shaped ears, and always presents herself as a cheerful joker in order to keep her complicated upbringing under wraps. However, since this ends up setting her too far apart from normal forest sprites, it actually causes her to feel even more like an outcast.
dictionary.fusion:
My body's changing, meow.
Hmm, this feels weird, but
it could turn out to be fun, meow!
dictionary.summon:
Where'd ya come from, meow?
I'm lost, you say?
M-Meow way!!

bb.name: ニャー！！

dictionary.description: A warrior from another world guided by the Chain Chronicle. Her lynx-like footing along with her colorful knife allow her to cut through large numbers of enemies, opening a path in their midst in the blink of an eye as they all fall around her. Lindsey is also very skilled in taunting enemies and leading them towards traps, which gives her fighting style a lot of flexibility on the battlefield. Due to her bright personality, she is considered the mascot of the Volunteer Army by her fellow warriors. However, since she never feels nervous or under pressure, the pranks she plays on her beloved comrades never cease, even during the toughest battles.
dictionary.evolution:
Thank meow!
From now on I'll surprise everyone
with more impressive stuff, meow!
dictionary.fusion:
This world's so fun, meow!
I just wanna keep playing
all day long, meow!
dictionary.summon:
He he he.
Nice to meet you, meow!
Oh, but hands off meow ears.

bb.name: ヴィーテルガスト

dictionary.description: A demon who swore her fealty to the nation of Estoria in ancient Ishgria. Cyan was often harassed by other demons for being a lesser, weaker demon until Savia saw her hidden potential, and took Cyan under her wing. Cyan then decided to repay the favor by dedicating her life to serve Savia, which was very unusual for a demon to do, and did her best to improve on her abilities to meet the expectations of her mistress. She eventually became as strong as some of the higher ranking demons, but by that point she was only interested in using her powers in the name of her queen, and nothing else.
dictionary.fusion:
To think I can set my own limits.
I'm as foolish as ever.
What do you think?
dictionary.summon:
I have no interest in another master.
I shall only follow your directions.
Thus if I revolt,
there are no consequences.

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効
leader skill.name: 蒼穹の神風

bb.name: ヴィーテルドライヴ

dictionary.description: The demon queen Savia's confidant. Once Estoria had changed its ideology towards one of unification after its alliance with Mildran, its army was in shambles. However, the reason why it would ultimately stay afloat was in great part thanks to Cyan. Though they had lost plenty of battles to the great military minds of Mildran, Cyan was able to persuade many Estorian demons to support her queen's cause. She is also said to have prevented many altercations between demons who disagreed with each other.
dictionary.evolution:
The heart is a frail thing.
That's why it attaches itself to
stronger ones. I know
because I'm weak too.
dictionary.fusion:
Thank you.
There is someone whom
I just cannot lose to.
dictionary.summon:
I only have one mistress.
No matter what happens,
I shall do Queen Savia's bidding.

bb.name: ヴィーテルブラスト

dictionary.description: Even after her mistress had been chased away from her throne, Cyan never stopped being loyal to her. It is unknown how Cyan felt about Savia and Adel's pledge to rid Ishgria of its senseless battles, but it has been confirmed that only one person fought against the Dark ancient dragon who sought to put a stop to their plans. Records show that Cyan's bitter enemy Jed never stopped pursuing her, but the legend that states she fell along with an ancient dragon is more widely accepted as the actual outcome.
dictionary.evolution:
I was able to grow stronger
thanks to all those who supported me.
You are one of those people.
dictionary.fusion:
Thank you for your cooperation.
I think it is very important
to show one's gratitude properly.
dictionary.summon:
I'm sure that person is fine.
I believe that they were able
to find true happiness...

bb.name: アストフォール

dictionary.description: A La Veda swordsman who surfaced about a decade before the appearance of the Ten-Winged Tormentor. Being the strongest Veda style fencing master, Dolk inherited the name of "Zelban." However, he soon found an incredibly talented pupil to whom he would pass this title, as he was more concerned about perfecting his craft, rather than serving as an instructor. Thus, his deeds left behind as "Zelban" are not many, though his skills reached outstanding new levels after he gave up his title.
dictionary.fusion:
Use whatever you require.
I know nothing of summoning, but I'll
accept it if it makes me stronger.
dictionary.summon:
I am not Zelban.
I'm the man who was once Zelban.
If you're fine with that,
I shall lend you a hand.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの全能力を１５％アップ
leader skill.name: 幻剣将の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復＆１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減＆３ターン、防御力をかなりアップ
bb.name: アストリーヴ

dictionary.description: An old swordsman who practiced the Veda fencing style freely. Dolk cared for nothing except improving on his own fencing. He began disregarding the Veda fencing style which had earned him the title of "Zelban" before he relinquished it to his pupil, and instead worked to perfect his own style of fencing. However, in the later stages of the war against the gods, the pupil he had instructed came to him with a plea of supplication. Zelban asked Dolk to defend the helpless in his stead, as he could no longer fight.
dictionary.evolution:
Things like fencing styles
exist to be remade from scratch.
They always progress over time.
dictionary.fusion:
Summoning is fine, but
you must not neglect your training.
You should learn to fear
over-familiarity.
dictionary.summon:
My pupil was strong.
But he chose to fight for others,
and that's why he ended like that...

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの全能力を２０％アップ＆弱点属性ダメージを無効
leader skill.name: 幻剣将の威光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な樹属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に１ターン、攻撃力・防御力・回復力の低下する効果を無効・被ダメージを半分に軽減＆３ターン、攻撃力に応じて防御力をアップ
sbb.name: ヴェーダ流旋剣『リクウ』

bb.desc: 敵全体に樹属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復＆１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減＆３ターン、防御力をかなりアップ
bb.name: アストレイヤー

dictionary.description: An old swordsman who practiced the Veda fencing style freely. Though the pupil he had relinquished the title of "Zelban" to tried to return the title to him, Dolk refused and headed towards the new promised land in order to leave a legacy for the Veda style of fencing and the name attached to it. Once he discovered the God Army on its way there, he donned the helmet he had once loved dearly, and headed straight to the battlefield to fend off the gods' troops. However, when Dolk's former pupil saw that the techniques his former master was using to fight were not of the Veda fencing art, he left without a word.
dictionary.evolution:
Progress should never cease.
Wielding a sword is life.
There is no end to it.
dictionary.fusion:
Breaking away from routine
is a fear that when overcome
awakens new powers.
dictionary.summon:
"Spread the legacy of Zelban."
Was I ever attached to that name?
Heh. It seems he influenced me...

dictionary.description: A demon born in Grand Gaia. An orphan since birth, the only thing to influence Drevas were the feelings of despair and demonic force emanating from the demon crystals which had been imported to his homeland from Ishgria. Unfamiliar with how to dispel his own loneliness, Drevas lay waste to ancient Grand Gaia as his powers grew. His most remarkable ability, however, was the power to turn others into demons. Legend has it that the gods had to devise a plan to limit Drevas's reach because of this.
dictionary.fusion:
That's unnecessary.
I don't need your kindness...
dictionary.summon:
You better not.
This has nothing to do with me...

dictionary.description: A demon born in Grand Gaia. Void of an affectionate upbringing, Drevas hated every living being he ever encountered. And though the opportunities to exchange words with his opponents during the battle against the gods were few, the lack of positive interactions he had only served to deepen his solitude. It is said that only the world's forest showed its unconditional love for him, as it helped him to rest and recover from the wounds he had suffered on the battlefield.
dictionary.evolution:
I didn't make use of your power.
I became stronger
all by myself, you know.
dictionary.fusion:
I don't need friends.
I'm used to being alone...
dictionary.summon:
Fighting is the only thing
that soothes my loneliness...
What's wrong with that...?

dictionary.description: Drevas became the biggest challenge for the gods after he defeated disciple after disciple. Though his powers grew to such an extent that average gods were no match for him, he would ultimately have to concede to the Holy Emperor. However, thinking Drevas's powers would go to waste if taken from him, the Holy Emperor sealed his soul into a pike instead, shortly ridding himself of it. Legend has it that the pike's voice then began reaching out to others across the land, hoping to finally dispel its loneliness.
dictionary.evolution:
Did I hate my solitude?
Did you help me to get over it?
Can you and I become friends?
dictionary.fusion:
Thank you...
I finally understand gratitude...
I guess it's a feeling
that comes naturally...
dictionary.summon:
I heard a voice...
A voice that transcended time...
I want to meet that person...

dictionary.description: A tactician who studied the work of General Weiss in great detail. When people began migrating towards Elgaia, Estelle led an attack by the civilian forces against a demonic beast. The success of her strategy was such that she was given an official position within the ruling government. Known as a great fan of Weiss and his tactics, Estelle is said to have memorized all of his work by heart. Using his strategic fighting style she managed to greatly reduce the number of casualties on the field, and became one of the most promising tacticians of her time.
dictionary.fusion:
No general should disregard
the importance of battle supplies.
He he he.
I've always wanted to say that!
dictionary.summon:
Our union shall be our strength.
What do you think?
Sounds cool right?

dictionary.description: A tactician who lived during the dawn of Elgaia. Appointed as the head strategist for the newly established Randall Guard, Estelle continued issuing orders based on Weiss's past strategies. However, after participating in various demon slaying missions with her comrades and gaining field experience, she is said to have realized Weiss's greatness anew. She then stopped merely mimicking his strategies, and instead began creating her own, though the real reason behind this course of action remains unknown.
dictionary.evolution:
I finally learned this on the field.
Knowledge alone is useless in battle.
We must go beyond that.
dictionary.fusion:
Resting before battle is crucial.
I read that in a book somewhere.
dictionary.summon:
The outcome of a battle has already
been decided even before it starts.
So make sure you're ready!

dictionary.description: When a demon suddenly appeared in Randall, Estelle was asked to create a plan of attack with the commanding officer. However, she lacked the necessary information in order to make a foolproof plan until Farzen divulged what he knew. Having learned the information she needed, Estelle created a plan to beat the demon and informed all forces involved. Apparently, the demon had incredible powers of recovery when near death, and thus a blow that would end its life before it had the chance to recover would be crucial to their success. After relaying this information, Estelle headed towards the battlefield to protect the person in charge of landing said attack.
dictionary.evolution:
The cheap copy of an original.
Is that all I amount to?
I'm afraid the bar was set too high.
dictionary.fusion:
I wanna become General Weiss's bird!
It's not like I can, but...
It's just a fantasy of mine!
dictionary.summon:
That group was full of troublemakers.
But Rouche gathered them all.
Those like him will build the future.
